1b1(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa snang drug brgya ga ng+gA /
1b2(yum): gnyis brgya'i ma/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'adzin po ga chadon dran
1b3(yum): glanag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de tso byi na no// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams kyang shin du medam du
1b4(yum): sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyiraro go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin nas pa'o// ra bo
1b5(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ ngo ci'i phyir na
1b6(yum): rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni yang da
2a1(yum): par spong ba dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
2a2(yum): chen po'i gacha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yang nyin /
2a3(yum): la byang chub sems dpe'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir gon de ni rdzu 'grol gyi rkang ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'gyur
2a4(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dbang po dang 'i dU 'i bra ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bor dbang ba
2a5(yum): kyong shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pa'i de'i phyir ga cha de ni dbang po dang 'drol ba ma yin no zhes bya'o// rab
2a6(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni spobs dang 'brel pa ma yin de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stobs kyang zhin
2b1(yum): med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni spobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems so//
2b2(yum): chen po'i go che de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa mo yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa ni
2b3(yum): gi rgya yang med pas de'i phyir gi cheng de ni byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go
2b4(yum): de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang ba yang shin du medal
2b5(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pa'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
2b6(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shin tu
2b7(yum): med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pa'i de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems da'i
2b8(yum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang shin tu med la byang chub
3a1(yum): sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3a2(yum): chen po'i go cha de ni tshad med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chad med pa rnams kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pa'i de'i phyir
3a3(yum): go cha de ni tshad med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa
3a4(yum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa rnams kyang shin tu med pa la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni
3a5(yum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par thathur pa brgyad dang
3a6(yum): 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i byer na na/ rab 'byor rnam pa rungarab brgyad kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go// de ni rnam par
3a7(yum): zar pa brgyad dang 'brel ba ma'i du su bya'o// rab 'byor rung chubs pa dang 'i sus song pa'i chen po'i gatsha rnye ma na byas nas pa'i sems pa ju/
3a8(yum): pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i goms
3b1(yum): med pas de'i byor gatshe ni mapar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sanas dpa' sems gyu
3b2(yum): po'i go chad ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang myed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir nan/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo
3b3(yum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa yang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha dron rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma che
3b4(yum): pa dang smon pa med pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin de/
3b5(yum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel bam
3b6(yum): yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gi tshe de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin
3b7(yum): rnams kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i ge cha yang med pas de'i phyir go tsho de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
3b8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shin du med la byang chub sems
4a1(yum): dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
4a2(yum): po'i go cha de ni bzhin gshegs pa'i sebs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shin tu med la byang chub
4a3(yum): sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dod 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
4a4(yum): go cha de ni mi 'jigs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas phyir
4a5(yum): go cha de ni mi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhesas rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin
4a6(yum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i glo cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni sngos yang dag pa
4a7(yum): rig pa dang 'brel ba ma yin nos bya'o// raba'i byer byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de
4a8(yum): byer zhe na/ rab 'byor byams pa chen po yang shin tu mid la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel
4b1(yum): ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gro chu de ni snying rje chen po'i dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ts+tshi hU~M zhen/ rang 'byor rna
4b2(yum): rje chen po yang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa' go cha yang med pa'i de'i phyir gre cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel ba ma yin na zhes bya'o// rag byor byang chub sems rjen
4b3(yum): sems dpa' chen po'i go nod ni sangs rgyas kyichos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'i dres pa rnams kyang
4b4(yum): shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
4b5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang shin tu med la
4b6(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pa'i de'i phyir go cha de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
4b7(yum): go chad de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha lang
4b8(yum): med pa'i de'i phyir go tshod ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yid zhes bya'o/ rab 'byor byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po'i go tsho de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
5a1(yum): go cha de ni phyir
5a2(yum): 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pa'i de'i phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
5a3(yum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bco
5a4(yum): banyid kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems da
5a5(yum): chen po'i go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir go cha de'i rang byang
5a6(yum): chub dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
5a7(yum): lam gyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid kyang shin du med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas de'i phyir ge ched ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin nas bye'o// rab 'byor
5a8(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gotshod de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de na'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam mas cung man
5a9(yum): ba nyid kyang shin du med la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pa de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel ma ldan nas bya'o//
5b1(yum): 'byong byang nub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pa la tu byin pa phrang mo 'dil stong pa gang dag gis sems can thabs cad bdag gis yongs su spya rnams brlab cum
5b2(yum): zhes go cha bags pa de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel ba mi yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa sems can thams
5b3(yum): rbad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes byago cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyi ste// com ldan 'das
5b4(yum): sems can thams can yongs su bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ba'i
5b5(yum): gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'tshams bcad de/ sems can gyi don du go
5b6(yum): cha 'tshal ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyi don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
5b7(yum): po de ltar go cha bgos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyi su dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras/
5b8(yum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can ni ma nung cig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ ye shes grong za gyi tshi gas
6a1(yum): gi slad du go cha 'chal ba ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yong
6a2(yum): su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to//
6a3(yum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad ci ci'i don du go cha bgos
6a4(yum): pa ma yin/ ye shes nyung zad nyi ci'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan la
6a5(yum): bzla ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsku
6a6(yum): pa me ba byed kyi yang bsgom par mye gyi/ gang du ya bsgrim par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir ldan/ sam ldan 'das zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zas ma 'dzeg gdu rnam
6a7(yum): gang bsgo bar bgyi ba'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub po dmi gsum mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du po bsgri pa de ni
6a8(yum): rnamam pa ba sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom padon tsas thams cad bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan su 'dzin no/
6b1(yum): sa kyi tshul du byin du mam padzin mamardzus pa bsgrum m+b+ha// rlom u das dus / sar pa 'du sbyin du ba ngas na
6b2(yum): ba bsgom pa'o// bam ldan 'das 'dus stegs rab gyi bar la du phyin pa 'i sam badzin pa sem pa rnam par bsnom / khornam ldan sa
6b3(yum): ba rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom po rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin du
6b4(yum): bsgom pa de ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pache
6b5(yum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste shes rab tu pha rol tu
6b6(yum): phyin pa bsgom pa de ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dri lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni rnam par rjes pa bsgom pa rno par
6b7(yum): ba sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni mig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa shes rab kyis
6b8(yum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di na ste zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa deni sde bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
7a1(yum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha
7a2(yum): pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
7a3(yum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni sa
7a4(yum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// com ldan 'das 'di la
7a5(yum): se shes rab kyi pha rol tudu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgrim pa de na
7a6(yum): ri bsgom pa rnam par bsgrim pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dis so// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom paden ches ba sgom pa rnam par bas ma ldan dus
7a7(yum): / gas na pa pa ji mig gyu rnam ga ma ma pa / ldan 'ad 'dus / sa
7a8(yum): rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni rno ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa den rnam
7b1(yum): ma par byas pa panam parnam par bsgom pan// ma ldan 'das 'disas/ sa kya mdu sbyin pa bsgom par na mye mu skyes sa
7b2(yum): pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'dilta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par shes pa bsgom pa gro ma lnga
7b3(yum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la sa/ kyib ma
7b4(yum): byin pa bsgom pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rje ba'i
7b5(yum): ti reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam bskum par
7b6(yum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
7b7(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
7b8(yum): byin pa bsgom pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na
8a1(yum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bskum pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ shes ra'adu' bye ba du da
8a2(yum): bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom
8a3(yum): pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbom po 'dzin lce'i 'du
8a4(yum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di rnams kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
8a5(yum): rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus de pa'i rkyen gis tshor ba
8a6(yum): bsnum pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa po sgom pa 'di na sa 'i khams bsgom pa rnabasgom pa'o//
8a7(yum): bcom ldan 'das 'di las/ sa rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chu'i khams brnal pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das / shes
8a8(yum): pa duphyin pa pa rnam ma mas ma nam pa sa ga pa ma ldan ma 'das pa/ shesam gyi ma
8b1(yum): khams brnam pa rnam par bsnum par// btsa ldan 'das 'asas/ ra gyi la du byon pa 'arnam pa nams sgyu smra pa sung bam
8b2(yum): ba bam ldan 'das 'dis swA~M/ zhes rab kyi du byin pa bsgom pa 'di rnam par zhes dri la grus bskyen pa rnam par 'atsun pa'o// ma ldan
8b3(yum): kyi ba mdu phyin pa sam pa na ma rig pa jam pa rnam 'di zlum du/ di
8b4(yum): 'an 'du byed ba skum pa rnam por bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dis de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom pa 'di rnam par nas
8b5(yum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom du 'di ni med dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pan/ na 'as dzin
8b6(yum): shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug pasgom po rnam par bsgom par// bcom ldan 'das 'di m+b+ha ste/ shes rarna sum par sbyin zla ba /
8b7(yum): reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'dus 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'i ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam po'i bsgom pa'o/
8b8(yum): ldan 'das 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de na srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ shes ram
8b9(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
8b10(yum): 'di ni srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// @
8b11(yum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni rga zhi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
8b12(yum): bsgom pa 'dodzin bdag bsdam pa rnam par bskam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskum pa 'dzin ma pa rnam po na
8b13(yum): ba bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni srog bsgom pa rnam pang bsnam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshal / sa
8b14(yum): kyi la du byin pa skam pa 'di ni 'gri ba bsam pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pa ma du phyin pang rnam na ma
8b15(yum): bsam pa rnam par bskam pa'// bcom ldan nas 'di lta / zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'din sras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgon pa'i/
8b16(yum): la sa pa ma phyin pa parnam mdzin papa ga sam 'a pa#
8b17(yum): khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam ma skye khams bslam pa rnam par bzlom
8b18(yum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di'i rnam par shes phyi'i 'grus bsgrim pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'ad rje
8b19(yum): ste shes rabakyi ba rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'drin mi rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bskum du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dis sa/ shes rab ci phyin pa'i rdo
8b20(yum): 'din 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'dini rnam par nas
8b21(yum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa/ ldan 'das de na
8b22(yum): shes rab kyi ba rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug pas po rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes ranam par sbyin pan na pa /
8b23(yum): reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha la du phyin pa bsgom pa'i ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam por bsgom pa'o//
8b24(yum): ldan 'das 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de na srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ shes ra
9a1(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa
9a2(yum): 'di ni srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ @
9a3(yum): ldan 'das 'dis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snyam pa 'di ni na shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ gas rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
9a4(yum): bsgom pa 'din bdag bsnam pa rnam par bskum pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltas/ shes rab kyi mam tu byin pa bskum pa 'dzinasnyam pan
9a5(yum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni srog bsam pa rnam par bskam pa'o// bcom ldan dre 'tshal skye/ shes ra
9a6(yum): kyi mal du phyin pa skam pa 'dini 'grib bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lngaste/ shes rab kyi pha del du phyin pa 'gram ni sas
9a7(yum): ma pa rnam par bsam par// bamam ldan das 'di la ni/ zhes rab kyi na du phyin pa pasam pa 'din skyes dra bskam parnams bstan pa ni/
9a8(yum): ldan das 'dil sa/ shes rabakyi ba la du phyin pa bsgom 'dzin pang zag pasam 'ornam pa ma / bcom thams dzi hU~M/ sa tsun
9b1(yum): mtshan pa rnam pa tshan gang can bsam pa rnam par bskum par/ bamam ldan 'das 'dis na// shes rabaskyepa ma du phyin pa pa rgyu dzi ga
9b2(yum): pa rnam par bskam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bskam pa 'dzini byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bskum ze/ bcom ldan 'das ni
9b3(yum): lngaste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshe rab po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
9b4(yum): bskam pa 'di ni shes pabo bskam pa rnam par bskam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la sa/ shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'dun 'dzung papo bsgo ma
9b5(yum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdom pa ni sgom pa'o//
9b6(yum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
9b7(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
9b8(yum): bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam
10a1(yum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab
10a2(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgo
10a3(yum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/
10a4(yum): zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsdam pa 'di ni byi nang snang ba nyid bsgom pa'i rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ skyes rab kyi pha rol tu dran pa bsam
10a5(yum): pa'adi ni snang ba zhing spong ba zhid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo kha 'dzin chen pa sring bar ma
10a6(yum): pa rnam par bsgom par/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa rnam par bskum pa'o/ tsam
10a7(yum): ldan 'das 'dis sa/ shes rabakyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'din 'dus rgyas snang pazhing bsgom pa rnam par bsdam par/ rnamaldan 'das 'dim / sa
10a8(yum): la du phyin pa 'asam pa'adzin dus ma byas pang bzhid parnam rnam pa bsrem ni ma na 'das 'angs zhes ma rje tu rgyam rna
10b1(yum): tshen mnga' mas 'das bsnang banyid bsam pa rnam par bsam par// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltas/ shes rabaskye ba ma tu sbyi bskam pa 'din tsha rgyu
10b2(yum): bsnang ba zhing bskam pa rnam par bskum pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ zhes rab kyi pha rlom du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni deng ba med pa snang ba nyid pa sgom yin
10b3(yum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di laste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang bzhin spong ba nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i/ com ldan 'as
10b4(yum): 'di ltas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'i/ bcom ldan 'das 'drel / sa
10b5(yum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltas/ sa rab kyi rol du phyin pa tham
10b6(yum): ba 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med
10b7(yum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
10b8(yum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo zhing bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
11a1(yum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das
11a2(yum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
11a3(yum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngang
11a4(yum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ ma ldan
11a5(yum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// ba tsam ldan/ 'das 'di lnga ste/ zhe s+ye ra
11a6(yum): kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dis sa/ shes kyi rA~M du byin
11a7(yum): ba bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bskam pa rnam par bskam pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la bu/ zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'drin pas
11a8(yum): gtan bsdam pa rnam par bsam pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chang mengs rgya sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
11b1(yum): na 'as sa/ @ margyun pa mam pa can gzusas med pa'i rnams zlas pa rnam
11b2(yum): 'dus sa/ shes rab kyi la du phyin pa sgom pa 'dzin rnam par b.rab brgyad bskam pa rnam par bskam pa'o// mam ldan 'das 'dil sa/ sa
11b3(yum): dun pa bskum pa 'dri ni mthar gyiso gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa rnam par brtsam par/ bcom ldan 'das 'drin
11b4(yum): du byin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par mthar pa'i sa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smin pa med pa bsgom pa rnam pad ba sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'a do rje sa
11b5(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ skyes ra kyi ba rol du na
11b6(yum): bsgom nga 'dzin ting nge 'dzin bskam pa rnam par bsgom par/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab sde pha rom du phyin pa 'i rnam pa 'di ni brdzungs kyi mas
11b7(yum): pa rnam par bskam par/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsdam pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bsgom pa rnam
11b8(yum): bskam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdam pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
12a1(yum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lda
12a2(yum): sa rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bskam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgomapa
12a3(yum): 'di ni mapa chen po bskum pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
12a4(yum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam pa
12a5(yum): bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rten lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ba sgom pa rnam par bsgom para'o// ma ldan
12a6(yum): 'dzims/ shes rab kyi ma du khyen pa btsum pa 'dzin gying ma coM za zlab sgom pa rnam par bsgom par/ maldan das / shes rab kyi
12a7(yum): khyen pa paskam pa di ni dgra ma zhing bsgom pa rnam par bsnam ro// bcom ldan 'das 'chims/ shes rab gyi par mi du sbyin pa parnam pa ma ni ngang dul
12a8(yum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni las kyi rnam par shes dpe sgom pa rnam par bsgom du'i
12b1(yum): na'adas nas/ sa kyi pa khyen pa pa rnamapa dzin rnam pa thams pa natsun pa da nga ma sa
12b2(yum): dang 'byor dang bzhin na/ dede bzhin na/ ra byur 'di lta ste/ shes rabagyi par ma duphyin pa bsgom pa 'din bzugs bskum parnam nga bskam pas rang
12b3(yum): zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'dzini tshor ba bsnam pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di la ste/ zhes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa pasam rin 'a zhes
12b4(yum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'du byed pa sdom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// ra bya'i byur 'drem sa shes rab kyi pa du
12b5(yum): pa bskam pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsdam pa'/ rab 'byor 'di lto ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'dzin mim sgom rnam par rgyun mi
12b6(yum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di men pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa ni/ rab 'byor 'di la so// zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i rje
12b7(yum): bsgom pa rnam par bskam pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lce bsgom pa rnam par bskum pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ma ste shes rab kyi ba la du gyi
12b8(yum): ba bsgom pa 'di ni lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste/ zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di la
13a1(yum): zhes rab kyi ba rol du phyin pa bskam pa 'din gzugs bskam pa rnam par bskam par/ rang 'byong 'di la sa zhes rabakyi la mdu phyin pa bsgom pa 'an
13a2(yum): sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi
13a3(yum): dubyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta sa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsdam pa de ni reg skam pa rnam par sgom pa'i// rab 'byor
13a4(yum): 'di las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ltas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po bsgom pa 'di na mig rnam
13a5(yum): par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bskam pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes po pa skam pa rnam mang bsdum par/
13a6(yum): rang 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'dzi lnga s+ho/ shes rab ste thar
13a7(yum): dubyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lha'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor ba'i lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa'i chen khrus kyi rnam pa
13a8(yum): shes pa bskam parnam par bskam par/ rangs kying 'jams/ shes rab kyi pa mdu khyen pa pasam 'dzimi me rkyen mngon pas pa bamam pa nga sa
13b1(yum): na gags rab kyi ba ma tu phyin pa bskam paradzarnamig gi 'dus pa das pa bsdam 'jam par bsdum pa'o// rab cad sa smrasas rab da bya
13b2(yum): pa pasam pa nan pa'i 'dus de dag po bsnum pa rnam par bskum par/ rab 'byor 'dem zhes rabakyi skam pazhin shA du pa
13b3(yum): bsnam pa rnam par bsgom pa'i/ rab 'byor de las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te rig pa bsam rnam par sarab
13b4(yum): ma zhes rab kyi pha la du phyin pa bsam pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa po snyam pa rnam par bsdam pa'o// dbu' byor 'di lta su shes rab gyi ba rol du sbyin pa'i
13b5(yum): ba'adzin ming kyi 'dus te rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'dini mig gi 'dus de dag de'i
13b6(yum): tsha rab bskam pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i nga rkyen gyis tshor ba bsam pa
13b7(yum): rnam par bskam pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom po 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o//
13b8(yum): 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab
14a1(yum): pha rol du phyin pa bskum pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ltas shes rab
14a2(yum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i
14a3(yum): nesa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsnyen pa'o// rab 'a
14a4(yum): 'disas / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mo'i khams bskum pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di la ste shes rab kyi pa ba tu phyin pa'i rnam pa
14a5(yum): rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bskum pa'o/ rab 'byong 'di la ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bskam pa 'dzi nan ma ma 'grekhams pas ma po rnam par bzlum pas
14a6(yum): rab 'byor 'di lta mi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// raba'i byor 'di la sa shes rab kyi
14a7(yum): na pa rnam pa dzin ma ga pa bsnam pa rnam mar bskam pan/ ra 'dzin nang 'a byed man
14a8(yum): ma par/ rang 'byor chem sa shes pa kyi larol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa ma gas pa thamam pa rnamapa che mas dbye ma na
14b1(yum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bskum pa 'din ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom par// rang 'byung 'di lta ste zhes bkyi rlom du phyin nong rnam pa dzin
14b2(yum): drug bsgom pa rnam par bskam pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg pa bskam pa rnam pa sgra mang po/ rab 'byor 'dzi
14b3(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsdam pa 'dri na seM
14b4(yum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgomapa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
14b5(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sring pa bsgom pa rnam par bskam pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom patshon skye ba bsgom pa
14b6(yum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste zhes rab kyi pha ro
14b7(yum): du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ltas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni sems can bsgom pa rnam par
14b8(yum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom
15a1(yum): pa 'di ni 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gso ba bsgom pa rnams
15a2(yum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol
15a3(yum): du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di la ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di me zhen can bsgom pa rnam par
15a4(yum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// chab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab
15a5(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di la ste zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'din tshor ba po bskam pa
15a6(yum): rnam par bsgom par/ rab 'byor 'drel sa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bskam pa 'dzin zhes pa po bsgom pa rnam byang bsgom pa'o// rab 'byur 'dim
15a7(yum): ra kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsdam pa 'di ni mthong ba po bskam pa rnam por bskam pan+d+ha/ rab 'byur 'jig so zhes rab kyi mardul tu sbyin pa bskam pa 'di ni sbyin pa
15a8(yum): rol du phyin pa'i sam rnam par bskam pa'o// rab 'byor 'dam sa zhes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dzin tshul ma kyi pa ral tu byin pa bsgom
15b1(yum): par bsgom par/ rab 'byor 'di ldas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa snyam pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pharol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom par/ raba' na 'di
15b2(yum): rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa sam pa'adin brtson 'grus kyi pha ral du phyin pa bskam pa rnam par bskam pa'o// ba'i phyir 'di la ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
15b3(yum): gtan gyi ba rob tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom par/ rab 'byor 'di lnga ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa pa'i ni shes rab kyi ba rol tu byin 'i sgyum ma d+hI ma
15b4(yum): ba'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang snang ba zhid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom ldan// rig byor 'di lta ste shesar rab myi ga rol tu sbyin po rna
15b5(yum): pa 'di ni byi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byi nang srong ba nyid ma b+hUR+R-im po ji sgo ma na
15b6(yum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
15b7(yum): bsgom pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam
15b8(yum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi
16a1(yum): pa rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas snang ba nyid bsgom rnam par bskam pa'o// rab 'byor 'di la sa shes rab kyi pha rom du phyin pa
16a2(yum): nga 'di nemapa' las 'das pa snang pa nyid bskum pa rnam par bskam pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta sa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni thos ma dang than me pa
16a3(yum): zhing bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bskam pade/ ra ba'i byor
16a4(yum): 'di sas shes rab kyi bar ladu byin pa bskam pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid bskam pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'dis sde zhes Sh+Te Ad+g+ha sa pa rnam
16a5(yum): 'don cham thams cad stong pa nyid bsam pa rnam par bsgom par// rab kyar 'dil bu zhes rab kyi pha rol du byed pa ba skam pa 'din ngan rje na snang pa nyid bsnam
16a6(yum): smra smran ma mi mi
16a7(yum): sezhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni dngas pa med pa snang ba zhing bskam pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byer r+m+ma pA shes rab kyi pha rom tu sbyin pa rnam ma
16a8(yum): ning band pang bded bsam pa rnam par bskam par/ rab 'byar 'das sa shes rab kyi la sa tu phyin pa bskam pa dzin ma pa ma pa rji 'i ni bang na
16b1(yum): rnam par bskum par/ rab 'byar 'dilas shes bgyi bar la du phyin pa bsdam pa 'don dran ngan 'a gnag pa bams parnam par bsgom par ts+tshab mnan/
16b2(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni yang dag par spang ba bsdam pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byo 'dim sa zhes rab kyi ba rim du phyin pa bsas pa 'dzin rdu rgyam
16b3(yum): pa bsgom pa rnam par bskam pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dbang ba snyam pa rnam byed ba skam pa'o/ rab 'byur 'dil mi sa
16b4(yum): ra' tu phyin pa bsam pa 'di ni skapas bsgom 'arnam par bsam par/ raba'i bye jim ldanas rab kyi la du phyi bamam badzin rgya chu
16b5(yum): ma / ky-i sa rkyen pa rnam pa mams pa'is snan ma
16b6(yum): las shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin du ba sgom du
16b7(yum): ni bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chad med pa bskam pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'tsha
16b8(yum): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu
17a1(yum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mtha
17a2(yum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par mthar ba'i sla spang pa
17a3(yum): zhing dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lnga ste zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon pa zhes pa
17a4(yum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam parar+ya bsgom pa'o// rlub 'byor 'di lta ste shes
17a5(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta shes rabya g+h+ri pha rol tu phyin pa bskam pa dri ni d+ha ba nan
17a6(yum): gshegs pa'i skabs bsdam pa rnam par bsgom par / rang 'byor 'angs sa zhes rab kyi ba rim tu phyin pa pasgom na ma 'dzegs pa bsgom panam du
17a7(yum): du'o/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste// zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sa sa yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bskam pa'o// ba 'byor 'di lta sa shes rab kyi
17a8(yum): khye pa parnam pa dzin thams pa chen pa pas mo rnam par bskam par/ rab bya dzin sa shes rabakyi ma du na pa bam pa dzin ga rnam
17b1(yum): 'arnam par bsas dang / rang 'byur 'dis shes rabakyi ba la tu phyin pa 'a rnam pa di ni sangs rgyas kyi rgyas na 'jas ra 'a
17b2(yum): 'di lta sa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di na rgyun du nags pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ rab 'byor 'di ste shes hU~M
17b3(yum): pa bskam pa 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu snyam pa rnam par bskam pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta sa zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir mi
17b4(yum): 'bras bu bskum pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dgrab tsam pa nyid bsgom pa rnams basman
17b5(yum): rab 'byor 'di ltas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdam pa 'din/ dbyang chub bsgomo pa rnam par bskam pa ni/ rab 'gyur sa seM nas
17b6(yum): bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa zhid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnamapa mas
17b7(yum): mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sem
17b8(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa med dam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la byer mi ldog pa
18a1(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan pa yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab nga byang chub sems dpa' sems na
18a2(yum): gtan gyi la rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med ngam zhes pasam gtan gyi ba rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'atshan pa sangs su na
18a3(yum): / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa btsun 'grus kyi bar 'du phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dmanas/ rnon dru
18a4(yum): rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa
18a5(yum): ral tu byin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pa mau sa m+b+ha badz+rig par gyu/
18a6(yum): nga byang chub sems dpa sems dpa can pa rgyal khrims kyi pa sa rgya phyin pa ma mngon pa chags pa med dem nas rgyal
18a7(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'tshan pa yongs su brtag par gyu/ rang 'byung \u0f7f chumasems dpa' sems dabla rten pa sbyin pa'i rog du rkyen po'i mnganas
18a8(yum): chags pa med dam zhes sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa yongs su ga 'du gyu/ nyid ma ma su dpa
18b1(yum): na ga na sa la ga
18b2(yum): rang byarang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa phyi snang bached la mngon par chags pa med dam 'a nas kyis ba nyi sa byung ni
18b3(yum): na tha yangs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byin snang ba 'i la mngon par chags pa med rje sa zhes sbyin po
18b4(yum): cid sa rgyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par byar// rabang byer byang chub sems dpa' sems pa chan pa sa ba'i
18b5(yum): chags pa med ngam nas snang ba nyid stong bzhid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yangs su brtag par bya'o// chu ma
18b6(yum): sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes chen po stong pazhid la byang chub sems dpa' chen po yongs su badz+ran pa /
18b7(yum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan dam pa spong bzhid la mngon par chags pa med dam shes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chubs mas
18b8(yum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brdeg par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong bzhid la mngon par chags ba
19a1(yum): dam zhes 'dus byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
19a2(yum): sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
19a3(yum): brlag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam nyes mthal la sa nas bsdur
19a4(yum): pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po TIg myu dadu tham skyed pa stong pa nyid
19a5(yum): la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes thog ma dang mtha' ma med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byung rgya
19a6(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa stong bzhid la mngon par chags pa med dam nes dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dmya rgyun
19a7(yum): yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong ba nyid la mngon par rdzogs pa med dam nas de bzhin mang ban
19a8(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpapa chen pa rgyas thams rgya btsu sa chu na
19b1(yum): chags pa med da mnas chas thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa yongs su bdag par byan/ myur byang chub sums da sa
19b2(yum): dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam nas rang gi mtshan nyid spang ba rked la byang chubs rgyas dpa'i sems dang rgyunam mam nim
19b3(yum): bsrung bzhid la mngon par chags pa med ngam zhes mi dmigs pa spong ba nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//
19b4(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa stong bzed la byang chub ses su dang sems
19b5(yum): chen tha yangs su brtag par bya'o// rang 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen marngab tshad spong ba med la mngon par chags ni don na rgyu snong
19b6(yum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par byang chub bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po yi du'i dzin
19b7(yum): pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
19b8(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa
20a1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnam
20a2(yum): la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes yang dag par spong ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems
20a3(yum): sems dpa' chen pordzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam nes rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
20a4(yum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mngon par chags pa medangam+b+ha zhes dbang po rnams kyi byang chub sems da
20a5(yum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes stobs
20a6(yum): rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi rgyan ldaganas
20a7(yum): la mngon par chags pa men dam zhes byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yangasas badzag par bya'o// rnabu 'byar byod rgya
20a8(yum): mas thams chams pa'i mamanams ca sa mdzan rnam da dman ma mags ma ma rdzus rgya ngas
20b1(yum): rnams dpa' chen pa langs su bdag par byar/ rang 'byar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'abags ni la ma rgyas
20b2(yum): zhes 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa yongs su 'anag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang na'i sems dpa' sems pa
20b3(yum): pa bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bsam gtan rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa yangs sun ma bar la
20b4(yum): 'byung byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po tshad med pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dmanas tshad med pa rnams la byang chub sems ngas tha rnams
20b5(yum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chag
20b6(yum): pa med dam zhes/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzag par bya'o// rab 'byor bya
20b7(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ rnam par thar pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
20b8(yum): chen po yongs su rtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bi mapar gyis gnas pa'i skams par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chag
21a1(yum): med dmashes/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang mtshan ma yongs su
21a2(yum): par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo sang pa zhi dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon dmed pa la mngon pa chags
21a3(yum): pa med dam zhes/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya
21a4(yum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags bla med ngam zhes/ mngon par shes pa rnams la byang chub
21a5(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chag
21a6(yum): pa med dam nas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
21a7(yum): dnga'achen pa gzungs kyi sgo rnam la mngon par chags pa med dmanas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sna nga ba' skams dpa rgyan pa mangs su
21a8(yum): bar bya'o// rab 'byeng byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs rnams la mngon ci rnal gi ming ngam // de bzhin mam
21b1(yum): nga'i sabs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ma mangs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byang byang chub sems dpe'i sems pa tsun pa ma na
21b2(yum): parnams la mngon par chags pa med ngam shes/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i rnyed pa yongs su brtag sa rtsam/
21b3(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan pas sa yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med ngamazhes/ rnas sa yang dag pa ga 'arnams sa rgyang rgyabasam
21b4(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pa yangasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa mang ngamanas
21b5(yum): byams pa tshan zhal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa can pa rnyed
21b6(yum): po la mngon par chags pa med dmanas/ snying rje chen pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// ram gyung byang chub sem
21b7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub
21b8(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags
22a1(yum): pa med dmanas/ thams cad shes band la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan ma yongs su bajug par cu'o/ raba' byang byang chub
22a2(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ lam gyi rnam pa shes bzhid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
22a3(yum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rang 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pazhid la mngon par chags pa med nga mazhes/ rna
22a4(yum): thams cad mkhyen panyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa yangs su brtag par bya'o// / zhes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa snang drug brgya ba du mtham
22a5(yum): pa/ bam po nyi rgya nyi shu ca ga \u0f7fpa// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo
22a6(yum): 'di la snyeng pa'i tshe ba ma gyis smras pa dang / pharal gyis bstan pa la snying bar mi lnga'an/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de shes rab
22a7(yum): par byin papa'am 'di la skyed pa'i tshe rom gyis dad pas mi 'gro'am/ khyer mi ldo ga pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems da' chen po zhes rab kyi ba la durnan
22a8(yum): gyung ba ma/ 'did chags dang cas pa'i sems brgyad pas 'arnams pa men ma/ rna 'imasems kyi nga bas grugs pa
22b1(yum): ga mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'brags pa ma yin nam/ khyer mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems pargyu rten pa sa sa byu pa
22b2(yum): la sbyang ba'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar mthu rim/ 'thang ba'i sa pa 'du khyen pa dang dran
22b3(yum): mgyur ngam/ btsun 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mthur dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar mgyur dam/ shes rab kyi tsham tu sbyin pa
22b4(yum): bral bar mgyur dum/ nas brtag par bya'o// gal dbyer mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dbu' chen pa dgas rab kyi 'dam tu phyin pa pang ma ma
22b5(yum): che/ mi 'jigs me spangs skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum pa dang yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing de'i mi byer nur bar mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi btsal tu phyin pa zab ma dus
22b6(yum): bar dga' la thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la klag cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la de bzhin nyid du na na tan du byed na/ ra b+h+rir byed chub sems
22b7(yum): sems dpa' chen po des ni bsngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dris shid yongs su brtag par byas pa dang / gzungs shing bcings ste/ kun tshwa
22b8(yum): par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por shes
23a1(yum): kye pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sngar skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum par mi 'gyur yongs su rnam par mi 'gyur zhing
23a2(yum): bye mi lhag la/ zas nas kyang gang du 'dzin cid nga la/ klog cing kur chu par byed de/ tshul bzhin du med la byed pa'i byer ro/ gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das
23a3(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su zhum par me 'gyuran
23a4(yum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
23a5(yum): pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i gsam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo di
23a6(yum): la banag par bya'o/ gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta na rnam pa thams cad mtshan pa 'i la gnal ba'i gas mtha'i byang chub sems dpa semasapa
23a7(yum): zhes ra kyil la du phyin pa da ma 'jal bdag pa lags mamaldan las kyis pa/ 'phrul ba/ du sa sa na pa na 'amam
23b1(yum): dpa' sems dpa' tshan za zhes rab kyi ba ral du phyin pa bab ma 'dzil nag pa yin/ rang 'byung ldan pa med pa la gnal smras papa chu ces ngan
23b2(yum): na nazhes kyi la tu phyin papa mo 'dis nag pams ran 'byur nam mtha'al mnal pa'i phasam pas byang rgyags pa
23b3(yum): za zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab ma 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gnol bas bsam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i tshen ni
23b4(yum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab ma 'di la rdog pa yin/ rab 'byor 'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem skad rten rjen
23b5(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'adri ba'i sems dang
23b6(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rnam par byung ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa
23b7(yum): dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rdog pa yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la gnol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
23b8(yum): chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la gnol ba'i bsam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
24a1(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnol ba'i bsam pa'i byang chub sem
24a2(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mnam bzhid la gnal ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa
24a3(yum): sems dpa can ma nas rab kyi pa la rkyen pa ngam 'di 'drug pa yim rang sgru bsam gyis ma thub pa'i dbyings pa gnas pa bya chu ma
24a4(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la
24a5(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rmi lam la gzhol ba'i
24a6(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor gzugs brnyan la gnol ba'i bas
24a7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' can pa zhes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa zang ma 'dril rtag pa yin/ rab 'byung na brtan la gnal ba'i bsam pa'i byang chub
24a8(yum): dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi datshul tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgeg rgyal gzhol ba'i bsamargyas su myas da
24b1(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgyu ma la gnol ba'i bsam pa'i byang chubs ma/
24b2(yum): dubyin pa zab ma 'di la rdeg pa yin/ rab 'byor stsal pa gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes ra
24b3(yum): 'di la rtog pa yin no/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24b4(yum): rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dran
24b5(yum): bzab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ smin pa med pa la gnol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
24b6(yum): bdag par gyur/ nam mnga' la gnal ba'i bsam pas byang chub sams dpa' mams dpa' chen lags rab kyi bar 'a byin pa 'i'i mi di dus pag
24b7(yum): 'gyur/ skye ba ma mchis pa la gnol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyu
24b8(yum): 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gnol ba'i bsas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/
25a1(yum): kun nas nan mangs pa dang rnam par byang bam mchis pa la gnal ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
25a2(yum): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen za zhes rab kyi
25a3(yum): rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol
25a4(yum): tu phyin pa zang mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu
25a5(yum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa
25a6(yum): zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen phra shes rab
25a7(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bya ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
25a8(yum): chen pa sheso rab kyi pha la du phyin pa zab ma 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmi lam la gnal pa'i bsam padu mi ma ldan pa tsham
25b1(yum): kyi ba sa tu phyin pa pab ma 'di la dgapa 'gyur/ gzugs panan la gnamatha' bas mangs byang chub mams na na
25b2(yum): dubyin pa thab ma 'dis rtag par 'gyur/ sku bstan la gnal ba'i bsam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'artani 'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zang ma
25b3(yum): pa gyu/ g+ha rnanas nanam pa'i bsam pa'i byang chub sems dang tsasems papa'atshan pa gas kye kyi pa da ma jig pa gyu ts+tsha
25b4(yum): rgyal gnas ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tha shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pazab ma 'di la rtag par 'gyur/ sgyum ga gnas ba
25b5(yum): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyu/ sprul pa la gzhol bas bsam pas byang chub sems dpa
25b6(yum): sems dpa can pa zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pazab mo 'di la rtag por 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pa gams
25b7(yum): lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du shes la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rdog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa la mi
25b8(yum): brnag pa lags sam/ rnab la nag pa lags sa ma/ ska la rtag pa lags sam/ lce la cig pa lags sam/ lus la drug pa lagams/ me la rdub
26a1(yum): lags sam/ gzugs la rdog pa lags sam/ sbal rtog pa lags sam/ dril rtog pa lags sam/ rol rtog pa lags sam/ rag
26a2(yum): rdzog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pal rtog pa lags ma/ sA sa
26a3(yum): bal rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtag pa lags sam/ lha'i rnam par shes pa la rdog pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes na ga pa
26a4(yum): sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rdog pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus de reg pa la rdog pa lags sam/ sI'i 'dus
26a5(yum): te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rdog
26a6(yum): bra lags sa ma/ mig ge 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tsha ba la drug lags ma/ rnanga'i 'dus de dag padzidzin gyis tshar bal nag lags spyan/
26a7(yum): nagapa gsus sa ga ldan rnam
26a8(yum): ga pa lags sa ma/ yid kyi 'dus pa ga pa kyi kyimatshar ba la nag lags mal lanan // mas ma
26b1(yum): sam/ me'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtag pa legs sam/ nam mkha'i khams la rdzogs oM sarba/ ma par shes pa'i khams ma
26b2(yum): ba lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtag pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtag pa lags sam/ rnam pa shes pa la rtag pa lags sam/ maung dang gzugs la tsug pamam
26b3(yum): ma/ skye chang drug la rtag pa lags sam/ rag pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtag pa lags sam/ sred bral dag pa lags sa ma/ yin pa mtshan
26b4(yum): lags sam/ sring pa la dag pa lags sam/ s+ya ba la drug pa lags sam/ gshel nag 'a lags sam/ sbyin pa'i bde tu phyin pa la jig pa lags pa/
26b5(yum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rdog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha la du phyin pa la rdog pa ldanas
26b6(yum): sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtag pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rtag pa lags sam/ nang sang bzhing la dag pa lag ma/
26b7(yum): bla sang ba zhi ma rtog pa lags pa mo// byi nang snang bzhing la jog pa lags sam/ srang ba'od snang bcid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen pa snang ba'i na
26b8(yum): lags sam/ dam dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong bzhid la rtag pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas snang ba zhid la rtog pa lags
27a1(yum): sam/ mtha' las 'das pa snang bzhid la rtog pa lags sam/ thog mdang ba ma med pa sdong bzhed la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba med
27a2(yum): bstong bzhid la rdeg pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa zhing la rdog pa lags sam/ chos thams cad snang ba nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nying snga
27a3(yum): zhing la rtog pa lags sam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa
27a4(yum): lags sam/ dngos po med pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams rtog bla lags sam/ yang dag par spang ba rnams
27a5(yum): la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam
27a6(yum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
27a7(yum): la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams la rdog pa lags sam/ chang med pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa
27a8(yum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ ti mthar gyis gnas myo ba'i sems par 'jug
27b1(yum): mas pa rnag pa lags sam/ rnam pa ya nga 'gram pa cid dang mtshan ma mad pa dang mnapa mang pol ma pas
27b2(yum): la rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgra rnams la rdog pa lags sam/ deng zhin gshegs pa'i nga
27b3(yum): rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byams pachen
27b4(yum): bo la rtog pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la jig pa lags sam/ thams cad zhes pa'i
27b5(yum): la rtog pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rdog pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das
27b6(yum): bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / gzugs la rtog pa ma yin/ tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du shes 'dzi
27b7(yum): ba ma yin no// 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin/ mig la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sA la rdog pa mtshan
27b8(yum): lce la rdog pa ma yin no// lus la rdog pa ma yin no// yid la rtog pa ma yin no// gzug la rdog pa ma yin no// sbal rtog pa ma yin no// dri la rtog pa ma yin no// rol
28a1(yum): pa ma yin no// reg la rtog pa ma yin no// chos la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
28a2(yum): rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par bshes pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ la rjes la 'o/ 'i
28a3(yum): par shes pa la rdog pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma
28a4(yum): yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rdog pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te
28a5(yum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtag
28a6(yum): pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te ra
28a7(yum): nga'i rkyen gyis tshar ba la rtag pa ma yin na/ sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin na/ mi'i khams la jug pa ma yin na/ rmed
28a8(yum): khams la rtag pa ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no/ ma rig pa la rtag pa ma yin no/
28b1(yum): 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// ming dang gzugs la rtog pa ma yin ni/ skye mched dru ga jig pa ma yin no// reg pa
28b2(yum): rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ len pa la rdog pa ma yin no// srid pa la rtag pa ma yin no/ skye bral rtog pa mtshan
28b3(yum): no// rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ bzod pa'i pha rom/
28b4(yum): byin pa la rdog pa ma yin na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtag pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi
28b5(yum): tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog 'am yin no/ ma stong pa nid song
28b6(yum): zhed la rtog pa ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid la rdog pa ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid la rdog pa ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus
28b7(yum): ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yino// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dor ba med
28b8(yum): bstong ba nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa zhing la rtog pa ma yin no// chos thams cad snang pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma
29a1(yum): yin no// mi dmigs pa snang pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos pa med pa stong ba nyid la rtog pa ma min na/ rab nyid snang pa nyid la rtog pa ma mnan/
29a2(yum): thabad dngas pa ma dbang banyid snang pa cid la rtog pa ma yin no// dran pa che bar gnag pa rnams lajig pa ma yinan/ yang dag par srung ba rnams 'jig pa ma yinan/
29a3(yum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// dbang po rnams la rdog pa ma yin no// stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin na
29a4(yum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rdog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams la rdog la ma yin no// chad med pa
29a5(yum): la rtog pa ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa rnams la rdog pa ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems
29a6(yum): 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa la rnams la rtog pa mtshan
29a7(yum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs rnams la rdog pa ma yin na/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
29a8(yum): mam ma ga pa 'dag pa ma man ma lda
29b1(yum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la jug pa ma yin no/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa zhing la ga pa ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad ma
29b2(yum): banyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni dgang yin pa de ni sras kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas// gang nam
29b3(yum): ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song / phyogs na'ang mi gnas/ yul na yang mi gnas/ gang na yang mi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dmigs so// 'gro ba dang 'ad bzang
29b4(yum): mi migs so// gang la grangs mi dmigs shing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par 'chang rgyab yi nus te/ gdags kyi mayin no//
29b5(yum): tshor ba'i ma yin no/ 'du shes kyis ma yin no// 'du byed kyi ma yin no// rnam par shes pas ma yin no// mig gi ma yin no// rna bya'i ma yi ma sram na yin na
29b6(yum): lha'i ma yin no// lus kyis ma yin no/ yid kyis mayin na/ gzugs kyis ma yin no// skas ma yin no// dris ma yin na/ ris ma yin na/ ga gis mayin no/
29b7(yum): chos kyis ma yin no// mig gi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes za
29b8(yum): ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus de reg pa'i mtshanam
30a1(yum): sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma yin no/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma
30a2(yum): no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rabs ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma
30a3(yum): yin na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rabs ma yin no/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cho
30a4(yum): bas ma yin no// sa'i khams kyis ma yin no// chu'i khams kyis ma yin no/ me'i khams kyis ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyis ma yin ne/ nam mkha' khams kyis
30a5(yum): ma yinan// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma yin no// ma rig pa'i ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma yin no// rnam pa bzhes pas ma min no/ ming dang gzugs kyis
30a6(yum): mayin na/ sdemachang drug gis ma yin na/ reg pa'i ma yin no/ tshor ba'i ma yin na/ sred pa'i ma yin na/ len pa'i ma yin no// srid pa ma yin no/ sna ba
30a7(yum): yinan/ na' ma yinan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma yin no/ rgyal khrims kyi ba ram tu phyin pa'i ma yin no/ brdung pa'i ba rlom tu byin bamamakhanan
30a8(yum): na 'grus kyi la la tu phyin pas mamanan/ bsam gtan gyi ma la tu phyin pas ma tshan mo zhes rabakripa 'du phyin pas mtshan ma/ nang na pa
30b1(yum): nan/ byasnang ba nyid kyis mtshanan/ rkyenangasang ba nyid kyis mtshan na/ snang bzhid snang ba nyid kyis ma yinan/ rgyan pa gang skye gyis ma mnan/ dan+d+ha
30b2(yum): bstang ba nyid kyis ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid kyis ma yin no/ mtha' las 'dis bstong pa nyid kyis ma yin
30b3(yum): no// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang bzhin stong panyid kyis ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa ni
30b4(yum): kyis ma yin no/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// ngo bo ni
30b5(yum): stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mya yin no// dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams kyis ma yin no// yang dag par spang ba rnams kyis
30b6(yum): ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no/ stabs rnams kyis ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma
30b7(yum): yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ bsam gtan rnams kyis ma yin no// chad med pa
30b8(yum): rnams kyis ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom
31a1(yum): par 'jug pa dgus ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo snang ba nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas ma yin no// mngon par shes pa
31a2(yum): rnams kyis ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgra rnams kyis ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no//
31a3(yum): mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma yin na/ sa sa yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ byams pa chen pos ma yin na/ snying rje chen po sna ma yin na/ sa
31a4(yum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma yin no/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma yin no// phyir mi'ong
31a5(yum): ba'i 'bras bu'i ma yin no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang byang chub kyis ma yin no// lam gyis rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ rnam pa rnam
31a6(yum): nang mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rname khrims cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ tshor banyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni sa
31a7(yum): shes nyin kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dang / 'du byed med kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nid do// rnam pa shes pan+d+ha kyang rnam pa thams na sa /
31a8(yum): pa'i dang / mig she kya rnam pa thams cad mnyan pa'i dang / rnab med kyang rnam pa thams cad mnyan pa med do// rnaresarnams nang mkhyen btsun
31b1(yum): lha ning kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni do/ yid nid kyang rnam para'akhyen pa nyid do// gzugs
31b2(yum): ha~M kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ sgra zhing kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa med de/ dri nid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ chos dkyang rnam pa
31b3(yum): da mnyan pa zhid nga/ reg nad kyang rnam pa thams cad mthun pa ni dang/ chos nid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen padade/ mig gi rnam par shes pani
31b4(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i rnam par shes bzhid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ sna'i rnam thar shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad maN+Da
31b5(yum): bzhid do/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid do// nga
31b6(yum): kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pazhing do// rna ba'i 'dus te ga
31b7(yum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg bzhid kyang rnam pa thams
31b8(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen banyin do//
