32a1(yum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bzhid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ban
32a2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar banyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidang/ lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bzhi
32a3(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing du/ lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhed de/ yid kyi 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis rkad pad
32a4(yum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dang / sa'i khams ni kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nga / n+ya'i khams ni kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa rjod de/ me'i khams
32a5(yum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhid de/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni dang / nam mkha khams ning kyang thams cad mkhyen pa ni dang / nam mkha
32a6(yum): khams nyi kyang rnam pa thams cad mtshan pa zhid nga/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa med / rig pa ni kyang rnam pa rnams ca
32a7(yum): pa/ 'a rnam thams cad mkhyen pa / rnam pa nas sha kya ma ngams mtshan pa / me rnams das rnam mamam
32a8(yum): mkhyen dang / ma tshang drugan yang rnam pa mas sa na na [ऽ] na'amya ma
32b1(yum): mkhyen pa 'i dang / sred pa zhid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ len pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ srid pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ning
32b2(yum): skye ba zhid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing dang/ rga ge nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
32b3(yum): rgyal khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'id kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhid nga/ brtson 'grus kyi
32b4(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
32b5(yum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// phyim
32b6(yum): stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
32b7(yum): banyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
32b8(yum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam patham
33a1(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
33a2(yum): nidang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rang gi mtshan zhing song ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa med na/ med migs pas
33a3(yum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mnyen pa nid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam 'a thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mnyam
33a4(yum): zhi de/ dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ning de/ dran pan par gnag pazhid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhid do/
33a5(yum): par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dbang po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
33a6(yum): zhing skabs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhi dang / byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nying // 'phags pa'i lam man lag brgyan
33a7(yum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid / 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa ni dang / byasam gtan ni rgyan rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
33a8(yum): chang meng pa se rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'i / gzugs meng nga'i sems pa jug pa zhi kyang rnamyi sems rgyam pa sbyin / rnam pa
33b1(yum): ning kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rlom par zad pa'i ska spang ba zhin
33b2(yum): mtshan ma med pa dang sman pa cid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni dang / mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnams
33b3(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dang / gzungs kyis cing kyang rnam pa thams cad mastan pa ni na gshegs pa'i srabs da kyang rnam pa thams ca ma
33b4(yum): nyid/ mi 'jigs pa nid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ sas yang dag par rig pazhin kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ rnams pa
33b5(yum): po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kya nam rma/
33b6(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa rnyed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa ni
33b7(yum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin zhing gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad martan na gyi de bzhin nyin
33b8(yum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi dgang yin pa
34a1(yum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de ni
34a2(yum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin 'di ni de bzhin nyid cig pa'o// mi
34a3(yum): gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid cig pa'o// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
34a4(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
34a5(yum): cing gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i de bzhin zhing gang / yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa da ste de bzhin ni dgang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gca
34a6(yum): pa'o// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
34a7(yum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// zugs kyi de bzhin ni gang yin pa ta/ rnam pa thams cad mnyam
34a8(yum): bamed kyi de bzhin ning dgang yin pa de ni de bzhin ning bcig pa'/ sgra'i de bzhin nid gang min pa dang / rnam pa thams kyad mkhyen bzhin rnyed ma payin pa rdoni
34b1(yum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nid gci ge pa'o// ro 'dide bzhin nyid dang
34b2(yum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig ma'o// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
34b3(yum): mkhyen pa mid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin zhing gcig pa'o/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa kyi de bzhin ni dag ci gu na
34b4(yum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin ning gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid bya'o// rna nga'i rnam pa na sa
34b5(yum): ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa nA~M/
34b6(yum): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i rnam pa sa
34b7(yum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
34b8(yum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin zhing gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
35a1(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa
35a2(yum): rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i di bzhin ni dgang min pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mnyan
35a3(yum): med kyid bzhin ni dag pa yin pa den du bzhin cing gcig ga 'jas tu dag padang bzhin kyang gang min pa dang / rnam pa thams na
35a4(yum): brjid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang min pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma
35a5(yum): brjid kyi de bzhin nyid dag yin pa de ni de bzhin tshad gcig par/ sras kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin ni dgang dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams
35a6(yum): bdam rten pa ning ci zhin dgang yin pa de ni ban / yad kyi 'dus te dag pa'i bzhin ni dag ban pa dang /
35a7(yum): thams par mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cid ga yin pa dzin 'dzin nyid gcig par/ zin ni dus dag pa'i rgyan gyimatshang badzin
35b1(yum): pad / rnam pa mas ma pan ca ngan ngas yin pa na can na ga da / sa
35b2(yum): ma d+ha ba da bzhin dgang len pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa med kyi de bzhin ming sa yin par ni de dzidzin da tsug
35b3(yum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rten gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin rnyi gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga pa yin pa rnyan
35b4(yum): rten rnyed gcig pa'o/ 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis char nga'i de bzhin cing sa yin pa dang / rnam pa thams nad mkhyen pa da
35b5(yum): na par ni nga bzhin nyid pa cig / lus kyi 'das te ga pa'i sbyin gyis chang pa'i du na mi ga zhin pangarna
35b6(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin zhing gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba'i de bzhin ni gang yin pa dang /
35b7(yum): rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin cid gcig pa'o/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
35b8(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
36a1(yum): cad mthun pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig par/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang min
36a2(yum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
36a3(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nam marnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
36a4(yum): thathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi gang yin pa de ni de bzhin zhing gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
36a5(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
36a6(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa panyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nying gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyi gang yin pa dang / rnam pam
36a7(yum): cad mkhyen pazhid kyi de bzhin cid dgang yin pa de ning bzhin zhing gcig pa'o// rnam par zhes pa'i de bzhin ni kyad yin pa dang / rnam pa thams na
36b1(yum): na bya badzin pa man macan badzin nyid gcig pan/ mang dang gzugs kyir bzhin cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pathams ca mtshan paT+TA
36b2(yum): len pa ni bzhin cid gcig pas/ snamatshad drug mede bzhin ni dgang min pa dang / rnam 'jams cad mtshan pa nyid kyi bzhin me gang yin paden de bzhin
36b3(yum): gcig pa'o// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang min pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin paden de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ cho
36b4(yum): zhing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ sred pa'i de bzhin ni gang yin pa dang /
36b5(yum): mnyan pa nyid kyi de bzhin ci dgang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
36b6(yum): gang yin pa de ni nga bzhin nid gcig pa'o// sred pa'i de bzhin ni gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dge zin pa de ni na du rna
36b7(yum): gcig pa'o// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rga shi'i de bzhin
37a1(yum): nyid ga yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sbyin pa
37a2(yum): rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa/ tshul khrims
37a3(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// brdad pa
37a4(yum): rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gamin pa'o// brtson
37a5(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
37a6(yum): gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig par/
37a7(yum): sa rabakyi par ma du khyen pa de bzhin te dgang smin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mnyan pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin rnying ga yin pa de na de nganan na nas
37a8(yum): nang sang ba 'idang du bzhin cing ga yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mnyan pa ning byed pazhin nyid pang yad da da de pa dag // ma
37b1(yum): bzhin 'di gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di kyi de bzhizhi nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin 'di gcig pa'o// phyin snang pa man de bzhin 'ad da
37b2(yum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid yang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stong ba nyidi steng pa nyid kyid bzhin 'dagang yin pa dang/
37b3(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin di gang yin
37b4(yum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gang cig no// don dam pa steng pa 'di kyi
37b5(yum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pade bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus byas
37b6(yum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'di gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus mo byas
37b7(yum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'di gang yin pa de ni de bzhi 'di gcig pa'o//
37b8(yum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa deng
38a1(yum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid grang
38a2(yum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / khrims cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
38a3(yum): nga'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid glang ldan pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos thams cad stong
38a4(yum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhini glang yin pa de ni de bzhin cid gcig pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid/
38a5(yum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi dpan
38a6(yum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
38a7(yum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de ni de bani nyid gtsug pa'o// rdotha nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhi gang yin pas
38a8(yum): rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa cid kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pa de ni de bzhin cing gcig pa'o// dngos po med pa'i to byo de byizhin cid byang sbyin pa dang sa
38b1(yum): thams sa ma ldan pa nyid bye bzhin cing gang yin pa na ban cid gcig pa'o// dran paskye bar gzhas pa rnam sang / rnam pa rnams
38b2(yum): mkhyen pa cing kyi de bzhin ted gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin cing gang yin pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
38b3(yum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa byed kyi
38b4(yum): da gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
38b5(yum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nying gang yin pa de ni de bzhin cing gcigs
38b6(yum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ci gang yin pa de ni de bzhin khyed gcigs
38b7(yum): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bani ni gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i bang
38b8(yum): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin
39a1(yum): / nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshang med pa rnams kyi de bzhin cing gang mi
39a2(yum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi na nyid
39a3(yum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma sto pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngazhin nying gang len pa
39a4(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gcig pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
39a5(yum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang sman
39a6(yum): pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mngon pa / sa panas
39a7(yum): bzhin te gang yin pa dang / rnam parnangs dang ma khyen pashing kyang po na ci byung yin pa de ning gi seM ga pag/ de 'di rnams kyi ben ci dbang pan
39a8(yum): rnam parnams cad mkhyen pa cid byed pan gyi gang yin pa de ni na da gcig pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi dbye/ da kyang se gyi rnam pa thams cad brgyan pa /
39b1(yum): gang yid pa da pa stug pa/ ga gags pa'i sabs 'akri' ba med pang ni sa sa sa rgyu ga pa
39b2(yum): yin pa ni ba ni ci gcig pa'o// 'jigs pa'i de bzhin ci bang len pa dang rnam dathams ca mkhyen pa nyid stong zhin kyang bang yin par med nas ngas ga ginas
39b3(yum): yang dag par rig pa pa ni de bzhin cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin cing bsdig pa'o// byams parten pa'
39b4(yum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pan ting gang yin pa de ni nga dzin cing gcig pa'o// khyeng rje chen po 'di bzhin rting gang yin pa nga ram pa mas
39b5(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ted gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nying ga len pa dang / rnam pa thams ngam khye
39b6(yum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum du bcu pa/ bam po nyes brgya rnam pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol
39b7(yum): byin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par sbyar ba'i gnas skabs kyi le'u ste/ sum bu brgyad pa'o// de nas 'dod pa na sbyang ba dang
39b8(yum): yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'a
40a1(yum): gangan pa de dgas su 'thor bar gyur to// gtong nas som ldan 'das gdun pa der da ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la skabs phyag la lanas
40a2(yum): gcig tu 'khod do// 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod par spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
40a3(yum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du gzugs cid rnam pa thams cadangs
40a4(yum): bste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyang gzugs// nor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'dugs cid rnam pa rnams
40a5(yum): cangs khyen pa nyid ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dkyang 'du bya'o// ma
40a6(yum): pa shes pakyed rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid kyang ma pa shes pago// mig nyid rnam parnams cad mkhyen pa/ rnam pa thams ma
40a7(yum): bci kyang mig gi rnab kyadu thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi ngan pas// nyi rnam pa thams cadam byin pa sa/ rnam la thams ca
40a8(yum): nga ma ba thams sa ma byed pa sa/ rnam pathams ca ma khyen pa nyi sa kyim// lus mas pas byams ca ma ldan paste/
40b1(yum): gas pas car rdzas sa// ma nga rnam pa rnams pa ma byed pas/ ma pa rnams pangs khyen gang yang ma sa
40b2(yum): ban+d+ha/ ma pa rnams cad mkhyen pa cang bang gzugs sa// bing rnam parnams par ma pa ste/ rnam pa rnams cadas khyen pa hrI~M ngas pa
40b3(yum): zang mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid kyang rdzig/ cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnams cadadu ma byed pa
40b4(yum): kyang ro'o// ngag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen paste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rig chos cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer po'i
40b5(yum): mas/ mig sa rnam pa shes pa cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gle rnam par shes pa'i/ nga ba'i ma pa gas pa cid
40b6(yum): rnams cadam khyen pa ste/ rnam parnams cad ma khyen pa 'ang byung ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// 'i rnam pa shes pa nyid ngam pa mas cad ma byin paste/ rna mas
40b7(yum): banyid kAng sna'i rnam pa gas pa'o// 'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ba'i rnam par shes // rdzas kyi ma
40b8(yum): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
41a1(yum): / pa thams cad mkhyen mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
41a2(yum): kyang rnamig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sa
41a3(yum): 'das te rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mthun pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang su'i 'dus te ga 'i// lce'i 'dus te rig pa zhin rnas pa
41a4(yum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
41a5(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
41a6(yum): nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te dag pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyed gyis tshong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad pa mkhyen pas/ rnam pa thams cadas khyen pa
41a7(yum): kyang mig gi 'das te ga 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba cings pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
41a8(yum): byang rna ba'i 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dres te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
41b1(yum): sa ga kyi dag dus te ga na gyis ba 'i ma parnams sa sa /
41b2(yum): 'das te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam par mas cang ma ldan pa nyid kying dus
41b3(yum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidang kya ming
41b4(yum): 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so//
41b5(yum): ting rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ ma pa tham sa
41b6(yum): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi thams so//
41b7(yum): mamakha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid namakha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa tha
41b8(yum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
42a1(yum): smra smras / ma ma
42a2(yum): ba shes pa nyid ma thangs sangs sbyi pa/ rnam pa thams ci sa khyen pa nga bya ma ba sa // mau gardzal ci mem ma tha ma
42a3(yum): rnam pa rnams ca mkhyen pa'i kyang med dang gzugs so// sna mdzad drug ma pa rnams su bye pa ste/ rnam pa ya yang marnye pa nyid ma mad
42a4(yum): rig pa cing rnam pa rnams sa das khyen pas/ rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ga pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma khye rnam
42a5(yum): mas ca mkhyen pa shA sa gyur ban// sad pa pang mu pa rnams cad mthu pas/ yab mdza nga myen pa nyid sred ma/
42a6(yum): rnan pa thams pa mkhyen pas/ rnam pa rnams pangs khyen pa nyid kyang yin pa'o// srid pa nyid kyang ma pa rnams pan rjen pa / yang rnams
42a7(yum): mkhyen sa sri pa/ skye bsang su mams sangs pa / ma ba rnams pa ma byed pa kya sa / byengs pa mas ma rnapa
42a8(yum): rnam pa ci rnams cadamakhyen pa ci sa/ ldan pa'i rolas phyid pa cing rnam pa ngas cang pa sargyan shi bang dren
42b1(yum): ral tu rten pal/ tshul khrims kyi rol phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nga na kyi pa rlol tu sbyin du
42b2(yum): brjod pa'i rol tu phyin pashing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzud pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// na 'grus kyi la tu phyin
42b3(yum): nyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'bras kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gangan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid mas
42b4(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol dran pa nyid rnam pa zas cad mkhyen pa
42b5(yum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mabyin pa ste/ rnam pa dam
42b6(yum): banyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// byi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bye stong pa nyid do// d+ha stong
42b7(yum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
42b8(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
43a1(yum): kyang chen po snang pa nyid de// don pa dam pastong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngoms dam
43a2(yum): brjod de da du/ 'das byas stong ba'i dam pa thams cad mkhyen pas/ ma pa thams cadamakhyen pa nyid kyang 'das byas dang pa'idang/
43a3(yum): sa ma pa ma sams ca / ya pa rnams dam na nas sa rgyas su ma mams sa
43a4(yum): rnam pa thams cad
43a5(yum): maldan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa kyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong banyid // thog ma dang tha ma med de stong pa
43a6(yum): ma pams pa ma ngas pa mas na nga byags mas
43a7(yum): ma pa sapa dang ldan pa / rnam pa rnams pa ma ldan pa shA med pa sang / dang blan
43a8(yum): sa na gas nga
43a9(yum): yangs rgya/ ma pa mas rnams sa byung
43b1(yum): masam khams sa na kyang byang na rgyu sa
43b2(yum): maldan pa ste/ rnam pa thams pang mkhyen pa cing / mau gas pa stod pa nying / yang ba snang pa
43b3(yum): parnams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa meng rnam pa thams
43b4(yum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
43b5(yum): cad mkhyen pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid // dran par
43b6(yum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma'is//
43b7(yum): yang dag par spong / bcing rnam pa rnams mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rje 'jal gyi rkang
43b8(yum): nyid rnam pa than cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams
44a1(yum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams ca
44a2(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnam
44a3(yum): // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan ga brgyad pa'o/
44a4(yum): pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid rnam pa rngam/ dmakhyen
44a5(yum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnam
44a6(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
44a7(yum): parnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyenam pa rnams cad ma
44a8(yum): ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sten pa da
44b1(yum): nga byas brnas par sems par 'dug pa rnams sa// u par byur ba dag snang bathaMd nga mamam ma sna ngarna
44b2(yum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par bar ba'i sku snang banyid dang mtshanam med pa dang ldan pa med pa'omatham
44b3(yum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngan par shes pa rnams pa/ ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas/ rnam pa mas srung
44b4(yum): pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams sa/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so//
44b5(yum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so mi dzugs
44b6(yum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam mas cad
44b7(yum): mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnam so/ byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
44b8(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'i snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen no/
45a1(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
45a2(yum): pa rnams so// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ gnyis su med
45a3(yum): cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis sum
45a4(yum): ci gnyis su byar med do// 'du shes kyang de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gci Na ste/ gnyis
45a5(yum): su' cing gnyis su byung med de// 'du byed kying bzhin gang gni ba dang / rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin thaMd gang yini bde ni'i bzhin 'ad gcig pa ni/
45a6(yum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byung med do// rnam par shes pa 'di bzhin kya gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang ldan pa de na
45a7(yum): bzhi dgacig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin
45a8(yum): di gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de/ rna ba 'di bzhin thaMd dang la pa rnams cadas myen/
45b1(yum): na dang ma pa na // su sa mi sa
45b2(yum): banyid kyang bzhin cad gang yin pa den de bzhin da gcig pa ste/ gnyis su gnyis su byar med de/ lce'i de bzhin rtse lan pa dang / rnam pa ma
45b3(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byung med de/ lus kyi de bzhin da gang yin pa dang /
45b4(yum): rnam parnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cid gnyis su byud med de/ yid kyid pa
45b5(yum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin 'ad ga nig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis m+b+ha ma /
45b6(yum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa don de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
45b7(yum): cing gnyis su byar med do// sgra de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
45b8(yum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
46a1(yum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byung med pa/ 'du bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams dam rten pa de bzhin da ga na /
46a2(yum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin cid kyidang yinan
46a3(yum): di na gcig pa ste/ gas su med ci gnyis su byur mdang/ nas kyi de bzhin cid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ci ci de bzhin skyeng
46a4(yum): na gtsug pa smra/ ga smra rma stong gnyis smra sgyur rnyed// gas rnabapa shes pa da du gang sa
46a5(yum): na da med dran pa ni na sa btsug pa ni/ gnas su med nga sa su byung dang / shes pa
46a6(yum): na pang smon padang / rnam parnams cad su khyen pa dzin da gang yin de / su spyad
46a7(yum): du/ su na ra na
46a8(yum): tha pa na sa sa
46b1(yum): rgyu ga ga/ nga na m+bu ma / ma pa gas pa na
46b2(yum): / rgyun kyi sa sems
46b3(yum): dngas ma nga rna susu
46b4(yum): gang ya ba nga/ ma ma dus rgya ba rgyad kyad pa ma dzin pa no pa /
46b5(yum): sasu byung ma / rna 'du sa ga pa na gang yin pa dang / rnam pa rnam pa byud ma rgyan pa 'a
46b6(yum): / ga sasu byung me nga/ sna sa tu ga pa 'di bani ts+tsha ga du na dang/ sa
46b7(yum): ban cid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gtsug pa ste/ gnyis su med ci drug zh-i su b+har med do// dag rig padangasas ga

47a1(yum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid

47a9(yum): rna gang ni pa shi ni/ ma mas saH dang rdzas sa sa na
47b1(yum): smra ga na
