52a1(yum): kyid bzhin gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin rnyed gtsug pa ste/ gnas
52a2(yum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mi 'dzags pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
52a3(yum): ba den de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su b+har med do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
52a4(yum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang
52a5(yum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
52a6(yum): / snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gtsug pa smra
52a7(yum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad myi khyen pa
52a8(yum): kyang bzhi nying gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su rmed do// rgyan tu zhugs pa'i 'dus chung bzhin da
52b1(yum): gang phan pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin bde na de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis kyi ltar med nga/ la
52b2(yum): nga 'ang ba'i 'bras bu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
52b3(yum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
52b4(yum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med de/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
52b5(yum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
52b6(yum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun tu zhugs
52b7(yum): pa'i de bzhin gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang/
52b8(yum): med do/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
53a1(yum): // gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byer mi 'ong ba'i de ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
53a2(yum): gang yin pa de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa /
53a3(yum): kyi de bzhin nying gang yin de na de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mod cing gnyis su byung med do// rang sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa/
53a4(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin
53a5(yum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
53a6(yum): sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su me
53a7(yum): cing gnyis su byar med de/ zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thob cing de lta dga' sakha
53a8(yum): du drang par ba'i'i shing brtag tu ma mchog/ tshig gi'i stong yul ma lags pa ste/ ni zhing phra bzhi mkhas nyid chags pas rigapapa yin/ 'dzags na/
53b1(yum): mas cad kyis yang nas par dadaka' ba'i// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na snang ba dang / gzugs yod par stong ba'i lha bri de dag la 'dis
53b2(yum): bka' bstsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lce'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzug
53b3(yum): tsho tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor bar/ 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
53b4(yum): thathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so/ 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnams par mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam pa shes
53b5(yum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
53b6(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba nyid rnam thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/ sna nyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
53b7(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o/ lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
53b8(yum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam/
54a1(yum): / pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
54a2(yum): nyid kyang smra'o// drid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
54a3(yum): pa nyid kyang ro'o/ reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnamyan pa thams ca
54a4(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rnang
54a5(yum): rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ sna rnam par shes pa nyid rjem pa rnams cad ma
54a6(yum): bste/ rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ 'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam parnams cad mkhyen
54a7(yum): sa/ ma pa dgas pa mas cad brtan pa ste/ mamam rgyad ma dang /
54a8(yum): ma zhi ba/ mapapa ma ma pa gas pa ga sa mams na
54b1(yum): bams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshig gi 'dus te reg par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams mkhyen pa 'di byung na
54b2(yum): chus te reg pa'i// rna'i 'dus te rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa 'i kyang snang 'dus te rig pa'i/ lce dus /
54b3(yum): bad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te rig pa nyid rnam parnams cad ma byen pa ste
54b4(yum): ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dug te reg pa la/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad bla ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
54b5(yum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te re/
54b6(yum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
54b7(yum): 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa rngam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma
54b8(yum): pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyi
54b9(yum): / kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
54b10(yum): pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
54b11(yum): kyang yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa khams so// chu'i khams
54b12(yum): nyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ mo'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
54b13(yum): pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha' khams nyid rnam
54b14(yum): rnams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'id kyang rnam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnams
54b15(yum): mam khyen pa rnam pa dgas pa 'ams so// mdag pa ti rnam pathams pa mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma ga pag
54b16(yum): mapa sa ma khyen pas/ rnam pa thams cad maldan pa yang kyang 'du byed do// rnam thang shis bcing rnam pa mas pa yin sa / gnams ca ma
54b17(yum): parnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams du mkhyen pa 'di kyang rna
54b18(yum): 'dus de reg pa'i/ rna lnga'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyed pa cid kyang snang 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i dus kyi/
54b19(yum): pazed rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa rnams cad ma khyen pa sna
54b20(yum): ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pal/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad braste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
54b21(yum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus de reg
54b22(yum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni/ kyang rna
54b23(yum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa rngam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad sa
54b24(yum): banyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid
55a1(yum): kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
55a2(yum): pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni
55a3(yum): kyang yid kyi dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa khams so// chu'i khams
55a4(yum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
55a5(yum): pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam
55a6(yum): mas cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnams
55a7(yum): nga mkhyen pa / rnam par shes pa 'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma dge pas/ 'ang
55a8(yum): ma pams ma khyen pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byeng // rnam ma gas pa nyi rnam pams cad mkhyen pa no// gathams ma
55b1(yum): kyang rnam par shes pa'o// med dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma du ga so/ sbrum
55b2(yum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// dag pa nyid rnam pa thams car mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnams cing ma
55b3(yum): nyid kyang rig par/ rdod pa cid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sreng pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas/ ma
55b4(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len par/ srid pa nyid rnam pa thams
55b5(yum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rdzams cad mkhyen
55b6(yum): panyid kyang skye ba'o// rga ga nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ni sha'o/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma
55b7(yum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha ral tu phyin pa'o/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
55b8(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ bzod pa'i ba ral tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngani
56a1(yum): // pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus
56a2(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol
56a3(yum): pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nang stong pa da rna
56a4(yum): parnams cad mkhyen pa 'o// ma parnams cad mkhyen pa de nyid kyang nang stong pa nyi dang de/ b+h+rU~M stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
56a5(yum): khyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
56a6(yum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stod pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
56a7(yum): ga rlung ma smye ma pasrung ma
56a8(yum): cad mabyer pa'o// rnam parnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas snang ba nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa rnams can mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa/
56b1(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dusu ma smras sbyang ba byed na/ mang 'phyas ngas pa srid pa nyid rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnas tha thasas kyad pargyu pa na
56b2(yum): kyang ma las 'das pastong po med/ rdug ma dang ba ma mang pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ a ba mas cad mkhyen pa dang ldan
56b3(yum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dang ba med pa stong pa nyid do//
56b4(yum): bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin
56b5(yum): stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin stong pa nyid de/ chos thams cad stod pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
56b6(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
56b7(yum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
56b8(yum): do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
56b9(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// jo bo yid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
57a1(yum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid
57a2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnamaso// yang dag par spyod pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa skye
57a3(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
57a4(yum): kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams sa// stobs nyid rnam
57a5(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stabs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas/ rnam pa
57a6(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub yan lag rnams so/ 'bogs pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cadan skye
57a7(yum): pade kyang 'phags pa lam pan lag brgyud pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mekhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags
57a8(yum): pa badzin pa rnams so// bsamagan gyid rnam pa thams cad nakhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ci byang bams gan rnams so/ nga me pa da sa rgya
57b1(yum): pa / rnam parnams cad mkhyen pa ci kyang chang med rnamams// byu drugs med pa'i sems par 'dug pa nyid rnam thams dam khyen pa ste/ rlom pams ca mkhyen pa
57b2(yum): byang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par zang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam pa thar pa rnams so//
57b3(yum): mthar gyi gnas pa na skams par 'jug po nyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'drug pa rnams so
57b4(yum): rnam pa mtha steng pa dang mam ma med pa dang / sman pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa bams pa mthun pa nyid kyang rnam pa rjod pa'i
57b5(yum): bad dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams pa
57b6(yum): da ba na cid rnam pa rnams cing mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting de 'dun rnams so/ gzungs kyi sgo ci rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa /
57b7(yum): ma parnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sku rnams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbubs nyid rnam pa rnams cid mkhyen pa ste/
57b8(yum): pang ma khyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshes pa'i stabs rnams sa/ ma 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnams cid mkhyen pa nyid
58a1(yum): ma 'jigs pa'o/ so so yang dag pa rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa
58a2(yum): rnams sa/ byams pa chen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams
58a3(yum): cad pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'i/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
58a4(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa dam bya bcu ga/ dum sto brgya
58a5(yum): shu aH/ gzugs rje de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dzin du na
58a6(yum): du ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis skye byar med de// nor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin rnyed bang
58a7(yum): pa na ba du ga drug paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byung mdud/ 'du shes mye bzhin nyid gung dran pa dang // ma rnams nga mthun pa
58a8(yum): ni ldan ci gcig sa / gnyis tshum ga las kyang med po// gyi 'i 'i ldan bad/ ma
58b1(yum): btsun ga kun pa na brnyan drug du ma/ nas su med cid gnas su byur med de// ma pa gas pa ni brgyan dgang na
58b2(yum): brnams cad mtha pa di shAn du ga d+hA banA pa de ni de bzhin gtsug d+ha ni/ gnyis su me cing gnas su byung med de// mig gang bzhin d+he glu
58b3(yum): dang rnam pabangs pa mngon pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang ldan pa ni de bzhin gcig paskye/ gnyis su med cing gi nyis smra byar mdun/ na brji ban
58b4(yum): nga ban pa dang / ma pathams cad mkhyen pa tshad kyi de bzhin rnyed bang yin pa de ni de bzhan cingad gcig pa ste/ gnas su med med gnyis su byung byed du
58b5(yum): de bzhin gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med ni/
58b6(yum): 'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis subya
58b7(yum): mi // lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su nong/
58b8(yum): cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
59a1(yum): / gas su med cing gnyis su byar med de// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
59a2(yum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid na
59a3(yum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi kyi de bzhin
59a4(yum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
59a5(yum): bzhin gang yin pa de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma
59a6(yum): pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rna
59a7(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhini nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su me cing gnas su byar med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'ini/
59a8(yum): bzhin nying gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ gnyis su med ci gnyis bya/
59b1(yum): medang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa zla byams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin ma de ni de bzhin nyid gca
59b2(yum): bste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
59b3(yum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dung
59b4(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyis su med glu nyis su byar med do/ lus kyi rnams pa shes pan
59b5(yum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
59b6(yum): byang med de// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'i kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin drug
59b7(yum): ba ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de ba
59b8(yum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
60a1(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yini pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i 'dus
60a2(yum): tereg pa 'di bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
60a3(yum): srabyur med do// lce'i 'dus te rig pa di bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
60a4(yum): gas su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang ldan pa
60a5(yum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
60a6(yum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byung med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
60a7(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byung med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor
60a8(yum): 'di bzhin nyid pa yin pa dang / rnam parnams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do/
60b1(yum): dus dag pa rkyen gyis tshor ba'idi bzhin gang ldan pa dang / rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid kying bzhin byed kyang bzhin nyid yang ston pa den du ma pag
60b2(yum): sa du med ci gnyis su byang med do// gle'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'di bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ni de badzin
60b3(yum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tham
60b4(yum): da mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshong pa'i ni
60b5(yum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do// sa'i
60b6(yum): kyisri de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su byur med do// tshul khams
60b7(yum): kyi de bzhin gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa s+t+wa~M/ gnyis su med cing /
60b8(yum): su byar med do// me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
61a1(yum): / gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
61a2(yum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
61a3(yum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
61a4(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su ma cing gnyis su byad med do// ma rig pa'idi bzhin tha~Mng gang yin pa /
61a5(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dgang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byur med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin//
61a6(yum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su blar med do// rnam par shes pa 'di na/
61a7(yum): ti bang yin pa dang / rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyis su med cing gnyis su ma byung med do// ma
61a8(yum): 'azugs kyi de bzhin nyid geng yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byung phyin bu de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis sra me chung gnyis su byang ba sa
61b1(yum): ma drug ga can nyid gang len pa dang / rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa pa gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su me gAs gra tu med pa ma
61b2(yum): dajing brnyan gang ben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pade ni de bzhin ni gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byur mad /
61b3(yum): ba'adi bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byur med do//
61b4(yum): srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mun pa de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis sre byar med do// den pa'adi ga na
61b5(yum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dzad pa
61b6(yum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byung med do//
61b7(yum): skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do// rgan
61b8(yum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar mi/
62a1(yum): do sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dkyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gas
62a2(yum): su med cing gnyis su b+har med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ngangan
62a3(yum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnas su med cing gnyis su byung med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ni
62a4(yum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams na
62a5(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// thasam gtan gyipha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin da sa
62a6(yum): bu dang rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cad gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnas su byung med do// bsam gtan gyi 'ol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin nyid gang len pa dang / rnam pa
62a7(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyid bzhin di gang yin pa de ni bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis bu med ci gnyis su byar med do// shes rab kyi pha rom tu dran da 'di bzhin nyid dang ngan pa dag
62a8(yum): mngams kya mabyend panyid kyi de bzhin dgang yin pa da ni de bzhin thaM bcis pa ste/ gnyis su med pa gnyisas kyang med do// nga snang ba kyi cani byed gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
62b1(yum): gang yi ba de ni de bzhin nyid
62b2(yum): rnaman pa ci bzhin 'ad gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byur med de// gyi snang banan gyi de bzhin da gang len pa dang / rnam parnams ca rkyen pa ny-id kya
62b3(yum): ni ba blanin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do// byi nang snang ba nyid kyi bzhin gyi gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ban nyid
62b4(yum): na pa de ni bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis sa byar med de// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin zhing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
62b5(yum): da gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
62b6(yum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byad med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
62b7(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
62b8(yum): min pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byung med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de ba
62b9(yum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de ban
63a1(yum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do// thog ma dang tha ma
63a2(yum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do//
63a3(yum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis byang med
63a4(yum): do/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su su med
63a5(yum): tsas thams cad sbyang banyid kyang bzhin gang len pa dang / ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin 'ad gcig pa ste/ ga su med cing ga su byang ma /
63a6(yum): nga gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin da gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing ga su
63a7(yum): ring ngo mi dmigs pa stod nyid kyi de bzhin med gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med ci
63a8(yum): bya dgapas pa yid rgya kya ban dgang yin pa dang / rnam pathams ca mkhyen pa cing bying bzhin dgang pa pa yan sa paskye sa ma
63b1(yum): tu med do/ banyid stong pa nyid kyang brnyan zhid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcis pa skye gnyis su med kya tu
63b2(yum): bya med do// ngas po mi dang 'dri bo nyid stong pa nyid cing bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang zin pade ni zhin du m-i ngan
63b3(yum): nyis su med cidag sa su bya med de/ rba panye bar gnag pams kyi bzhi cing gang ban pa dang rnam pa thams cad mabyed pa med kyang bdun 'a gang yi mi ni
63b4(yum): pa skye gcesu med cing gnyis su byar med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de ba'i nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhi gcis
63b5(yum): swA gi sa su med cing gnyis su byung med de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi ning pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang bzhi pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de na pa ni na
63b6(yum): ste gnyis su med cing gnyi su med do// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byed bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
63b7(yum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
63b8(yum): ste gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
64a1(yum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
64a2(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig po ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin
64a3(yum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med tsang gnyis su byur med do// gsum
64a4(yum): gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang ban pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su da ba
64a5(yum): b+hang med do// tshad med pa rnams kyi bzhin da gang yin pa dang / rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin pad gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
64a6(yum): med rjeng gnyis su byang med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi'i bzhin na gang
64a7(yum): da ni de zhin 'od gtsa pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bya med do// rnam par thar ba rnams kyi bzhin de rang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams mkhyen pa
64a8(yum): da pang yin pa de ni de bzhin cid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cid kyi thas su kyang med po mthang gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyi
64b1(yum): nga bdag / rnam parnams cad mthun pa ny-id thaM bzhin na dru gang 'an pa na de panan 'a gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gA umam+b+ha na ro// u ba la
64b2(yum): slong banyid dang / mardzam med pa ldan pa meng pa'i 'di ban ni de bzhin nyid snang drani pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'di banga'i nang de
64b3(yum): / du mang de gnyis su bya med pa/ mas par shes parnams kyang bzhin nyid gang drani pa dang / rnam pathams cad mabyon pa ra byi pa dbang bar 'dzidu
64b4(yum): pa ste gtas sa med cing gnyis su byung med do// ji 'dzin mas kya bzhin cid gang 'an+d+hapa / rnam parnams cad mthun pa cid kyi'i zhi du
64b5(yum): na bdagacig pa ste banyis su med cid gnyis su byar med do// gzungs kyi sna rnams kyang bzhin cing gang yin pa dang / rnam pa rnams cad maldan pa
64b6(yum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
64b7(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
64b8(yum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// so so yang /
65a1(yum): dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
65a2(yum): su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig bskye
65a3(yum): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byung med do// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste
65a4(yum): su med cing gnyis su byung med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin na nyid gang yatshas
65a5(yum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
65a6(yum): da kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pade na de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byad med do// lan cig phying 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'di ldan seMd ga
65a7(yum): bdung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnas su med cing gnas su byung med de/ ra mdzang ba
65a8(yum): dra 'di bzhin ci gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin cing gang bani bden dngazhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cu gnyis su byung/
65b1(yum): ma ra ba ba na padud/ rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid kyi bzhin gang yin pa ni de bzhin kyang pa pagyi gang bu
65b2(yum): cing gnyis su byar med do// nga byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'ad yang smin pa de ni bradzin nyid gcig pa ste pas du ma
65b3(yum): gas su byung med do// kham gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi da zhin cid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa rnams cad ma byin pa nyid kying bzhin cing gang ban+de bdun
65b4(yum): ma ba ste/ brjes su med cing gnyis su byur med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnamathams cad mkhyen pa nyid ci
65b5(yum): gang len pa do ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do// lan cig phyir dong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang ldan pa dang / rnam pa thams
65b6(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnams
65b7(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gtsug pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byung med do// dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin cing gang yin
65b8(yum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
66a1(yum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
66a2(yum): do byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyi su/
66a3(yum): byung rer ro// sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su
66a4(yum): med do// ltab dri dag don gyi dbang de gzigs pa de badzin gshegs pa'i phrin las chung ba la thugs gnol te chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin ni/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta
66a5(yum): ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu med la brtag tu med la rtog ge'i spyod du yul ma yin te/ ni dang /
66a6(yum): za ba zhing mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba snyed ni sras kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/ rnam yang mngon par sangs rgyas
66a7(yum): gang yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// lja'i bu dag na mkhang zab pa'i phyir rjes dadi zab po lta bu dag
66a8(yum): da ma papa da'i bye rdzas 'ad bang po// du dag chos kyi tshungs zang pa'i bye chos di rab ga/ bang bu dag du ba par byu sa 'a bdag// bya chu
66b1(yum): kyis ma khyab ba'i byis pab pabargyang ngas 'ad rab / khwa'i ba dag tha' yas su med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di babapa/ lnga'i bu dag dro dang / 'gro med bdab ba bgyir nas 'dring zo
66b2(yum): bu dag ma skye mi 'gag pa dang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa sa la zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lnga bu dag kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang yan
66b3(yum): nga rdzogs par byang chub med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo lnga'i bu dag mngon par du bya ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba theb pa'i phyir chos 'di rab bo// lngang bu dag nga/
66b4(yum): ba pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sems nan zla dang byer zlog 'dri zab bo// lha bu dag srog zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ 'i bu dag 'gro bzad pa'i phying chos khrim
66b5(yum): ga zu gags bzab pa'i byer nas de rab po/ ltung bung ga gang dag ba pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// 'i bu ngag bzhed can bab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab pa/ 'i du dadag
66b6(yum): ba'i phyir rgyas 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag byed pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// rtswa'i bu dag nor ba ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lta'i bu dag shes pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/
66b7(yum): ngag mthong ba po zab pa'i phying chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zang po// lha'i bu dag 'du shes zab pa'i phyis
66b8(yum): rgyas 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab pa/ lha'i bu dag rnam par shes bzab pa'i phyir chos 'di ba bo lha'i bu dag mi gi zab par byed nas 'ang zab bo kyi
67a1(yum): bu dag rna ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag sna zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lce zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag lus zab pa'i phyir
67a2(yum): chos 'di zab po/ 'i bu dag yid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha'i bu bdag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag sgra zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
67a3(yum): zab bo// lha'i bu dag dri zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rol zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag reg zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag chos zang pa
67a4(yum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mig gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// 'i bu dag rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di za ba go zhwa'i bu dag ste rnam
67a5(yum): shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag lce'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag lus kyi rnam par shes ba za' nga'i phyir chos 'di zadas/
67a6(yum): buM dag yid kyi rnam par shes zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// 'i bu dag cig gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// 'i bu dag rna pa'i 'dus te'i ga
67a7(yum): bya chos 'di zab pa/ 'a'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ khwa'i bradag lce'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab pa/ bu dag grus
67a8(yum): dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bradag yid kyi 'dug te reg pa zab pa'i byer chos 'ang zab po// khwa'i drang dag mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis che
67b1(yum): brlab par byeng nas 'di da bab/ 'bru dag rna ba'i 'dus te rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshar babab pa'i phyir nas 'dri zab pa/ 'i bu dag sdu 'dus te ga pa yin gyi
67b2(yum): ba'i phyir chos 'di bab bo// lhu'i bug ng+gA'i 'dus te nges pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bzab pa'i byed chos 'di bab / ltu bu dag grus kyi 'dus de rig pa'i rkyen gyis car pa dab pa'i sbyi
67b3(yum): 'dabab ba// shA bu dag kyi na zla bu'i byed chos 'di zab pa/ Sh+Tha'i bu dag pa'i khams pa bang byed chas 'di zab pa// khwa'i bu dag nu'i khams dab pa sbyi
67b4(yum): ma ga zha drad sel ma sa zab pa'i byor gyi 'di zab pa// lha'i bu dag rlung gi khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zabab// lha'i bu dgas ni khams zab pa'i
67b5(yum): zlab go/ lta bu dag rnam pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// dz+ha'i bu dag ma rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zang po/ lha'i bu dag 'ang byed zab pa'i phyi chos 'do zab
67b6(yum): go l+la'i bung ba rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir ches 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag ming dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// TI bu dgu ste mamed drug za' pa'i
67b7(yum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor bzung ba'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// brig+h+ra sred pa zab pa'i phyir chos
67b8(yum): rbab ba 'i bu dag len pa zab pa'i phyi'i chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag srid pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag skye bzab pa'i rgyas 'ang zab bo// lha'i bu dag na shig/
68a1(yum): ba byur chos 'di zab go lnga'i bu dag sbyin pa'i ma rab tu phyin bu'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// bu dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i bying chos 'di dag
68a2(yum): bu dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyid pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol
68a3(yum): tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shes rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo lha'i
68a4(yum): dag byi stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag stong pa nyid zlab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//
68a5(yum): budag chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag don dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'dus byas sngo ba nyid zab pa'i phyir chos kyi
68a6(yum): zab bo/ lnga'i bu dag 'das ma byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag thogs
68a7(yum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyi chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dor ba med pa stong pa zed dbu 'o// lha'i bu dag rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/
68a8(yum): bung dag chos thams cad da pacing zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab papa/ lha'i bu dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab pa/ lha'i bu dag med migs pa spong
68b1(yum): bapa zu nag zu ga ngas pa mang pa gang ba pa pa byang nam pa ba// nga du dag bcad ma na
68b2(yum): rabab/ lnga bu dag dngas pa med pa'i nga bzed stong ba med bab pa'i phyi'i chos 'di bab pa/ shA bungs dran pa nye bang gzhug pa zab pa' byor nas 'di dag 'ang
68b3(yum): 'ang dag par spang bzab pa'i byur nas 'di zab pa/ bru bungs rngu 'dul gyi dang bzab pa'i phyi chas 'di rab pa lnga'i bu dag dbang ba zab pa'i ming chos zab sa
68b4(yum): 'bridag sangs rab pa'i byor nas 'dab pa// lnga'i bu dag byeng chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir chos 'dizab bo// 'i bu dag 'a gas pa'i 'am 'an lag
68b5(yum): bar byid nas 'di zab bo// lha bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po ldan bu dag bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir chos 'di rab bo// khwa'i bu dag tshar ming mi
68b6(yum): zab pa'i byeng chos 'di bab bo// 'i bu dag gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pazab pa'i byor chos 'di zab bo// rtswa bu dag rnam par thar ba rab gyi sa 'a
68b7(yum): ba ga/ Sh+Na bu dag mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnams papa drug pa zab pa'i bye kyis 'di zab pa// 'a'i bu dag rnam par byur ba'i sgra snong pa sa mtsha ma meng pa dang ston pa zad pa
68b8(yum): kyibyas di zabag bya'i bu dag mngon par shes pazab pa'i byed tshes 'di rab go zla bu dgating nge 'dzin zab pa'i phying ches 'di bab po blang bre dag bzungs kyi sgribab pa'i phyir ro//
69a1(yum): / 'di zab bo/ lnga'i bdag bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mi 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// 'i bu dag sos yang da
69a2(yum): dge pa zab pa'i byer chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag byams pa chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag sangs rgyas kyi rjes
69a3(yum): ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'a/
69a4(yum): zab bo// lha'i bu dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dgra bcom pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rang byang chub zab pa'i
69a5(yum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyid chos 'di rnab mo
69a6(yum): bu dag rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dgu pa'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mamar to// de ci'i slad du zhe ni/ bcom ldan 'das
69a7(yum): chos 'di ni gzugs bzung ba'i slad du ma lags me gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags tshor ba bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i srid du bstan pa ma lags
69a8(yum): 'du shes gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ ma gzungs pa'i srad du bstan pa mi lags/ 'du byed gzung ba'i slang ma labs/ mi brdung ba'i srad du bstan pa ma lags rnam par rjes
69b1(yum): bgazung ba'i mdum lags gzung ba snad du bstan pa ma lasas/ migazung ba zang du ma lags ma gardung ba'i slad du bstan pas bag/ nang ma /
69b2(yum): lags mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sdu gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ me gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lce gzung ba'i slad du ma lags me gzung ba'i sa
69b3(yum): du bstan pa ma lags/ lus gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ me gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags// mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags
69b4(yum): bajugs gzung ba'i slad du ma lags// mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ sgra gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags jig byeng ba'i sna dus
69b5(yum): lags mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ ro gzung ba'i slad du ma lags mi gzung ba'i slad du bslad du bstan pa ma lags/ reg gzung ba'i slad du ma lags mi bzung ba'i slad
69b6(yum): bstan pa ma lags chos gzud pa'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i skad bstan pa ma lag
69b7(yum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bsten pa ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
69b8(yum): kye'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa mang/
70a1(yum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags tshig gi dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slang du ma lags/ me gardung ba'i
70a2(yum): du bstan pa ma 'gas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i srang du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ snga'i dus te rig pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags mi bzung ba srang du
70a3(yum): ngam lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung bab slad
70a4(yum): du bstan pa ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i srad du bstan pa ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i ska
70a5(yum): ma lags mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ me gzung ba'i srad du bstan pa ma lags/ sna
70a6(yum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzug pa'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma la/
70a7(yum): mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba 'tshor ba gzung ba'i srangad du ma lags me bzung ba'i slang du bstan pa ma 'gas/ yid kyi 'dus zhig pa
70a8(yum): 'a tshor ba brdung ba'i sring du ma lags/ mi gadrung ngab sring du bstan pa ma rigs/ sa khams gzung ba'i slang du ma lags/ ma gzung ba'i slad du bstan pam lags chul khams pang
70b1(yum): / nga pa napa sa seM la chung mang ma gas da ma ga/ smra
70b2(yum): slang dum 'das/ ma brdung ba snang du bstan pa ma lags/ nam pa'i lam lo gzung ba'i srang du ma pags/ mi gdung ba'i gang du bstan pam gis/ rnam
70b3(yum): bza'asas bang ba'i sad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i phud du gan pa ma lags ma rig pa bzung ba'i sreng ma lags/ mi brdung ba'i slang du bstan pa ma 'gas/ 'du byu
70b4(yum): ba skad du ma lags/ me gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i srad du bstan pa lags/ ming dang ba
70b5(yum): gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ skye mched drug gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i srang du bstan pa ma lags/
70b6(yum): reg pa bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ tsher ba gzung ba'i slad du mi lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags
70b7(yum): sbed pa brjeng ba'i srang du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ len pa gi drung ba'i srid du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slang du bstan pas lags
70b8(yum): srid pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ skye ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gardung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lasas
71a1(yum): kye mi gzung ba'i snang du bstan pa ma lags
71a2(yum): / rga shi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rdul
71a3(yum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags//
71a4(yum): mi zung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi
71a5(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung
71a6(yum): nga'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ byi stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags
71a7(yum): mibazung ba'i sring du bstan pa ma lags/ byinang stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i srang du bstan pa ma lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gdung ba nga
71a8(yum): sa gas/ yang rung bab srang dum snyan par 'grug/ chen pa snang ba nyid gzung ba'i srang dum 'gas/ mi gzung ba gang du brtan pa ma'ams pa ma yin
71a9(yum): baju ba thaMng dum 'das/ mi gardung ba'i sring du ban pa ma lags/ rjes byas ga pa shi zungs pa srid du pa lags meg nga du rnan pa
71b1(yum): nas dang ma sa ng+gA ma yas ma sa pa ga dung pa u su m+bu
71b2(yum): bstan pa ma lags thig ma dbum med pa byed gzung ba'i srad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slang du bstan pa sa lags/ dang bamed pa stong pa zed gzung ba'i mad dus pani ni
71b3(yum): mi brdung ba'i spang du rgan pa ma labs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slang du bstan pa ma 'gas/ chos thams cad stong ba nyi gzung ba'i
71b4(yum): du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rang gi tshun nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i snang du bstan pa ma lags/ meng mchis na
71b5(yum): stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags// mi gzung ba'i bslad bstan pa ma lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma las/ mi gzung ba'i skad du bstan pam
71b6(yum): legs ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i skad du ma lags/ mi gzung du bstan pa ma lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i skad du ma lags/
71b7(yum): mi bzung ba'i skad du bstan pa mo lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag po rnams gzung ba'i srad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i dung du bstan pa ma legs pa dag par nga/
71b8(yum): rdzang ba sri dum gas ma b.rung ba'i srad du bstan pa ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gzung ba'i srang du ma logs/ mi bzung ba'i srang du bgan pa ma gas dang /
72a1(yum): / rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bdud pa'i skad du bstan pa ma lags/ stobs rnams gzung ba'i srang du ma lags/ mi gzung ba skad du bstan pa ma lags
72a2(yum): chub kyi yan lag rnams bzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i srang du bstan pa ma las/ bdags pa lam yan lag rgyad pa gzung ba'i slang du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slang /
72a3(yum): bstan pa ma las/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gzung ba'i srang du ma lags/ rnami gdung ba'i srang du brtan pa ma lags/ bam gan ma brdung ba'i sring du sa 'das
72a4(yum): gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa lags/ chad med pa rnams gzung ba'i srad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
72a5(yum): rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa
72a6(yum): ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par jug pa rnams gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ ma gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rnam par thar ba'i sgra stong pa 'i dang /
72a7(yum): nas rung pa dang snyan pa med pa gardung ba'i dug 'gas/ mo gdung ba'i gling du ban pa ma 'gas/ mngon par shes pa rnams gzung ba'i spyang du ma lags
72a8(yum): bzung ba'i sladang du bzhin pa ma lags/ ting de 'dzini rnams gzung ba'i srad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma 'gas gzungs kyi sa rnam gzung bI m+ba ra?
72b1(yum): du sa sa rgya pa nga sa sa

72b5(yum): ba sring du bstan pa ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du ma 'gas/ mi gzung ba'i slang du bstan pa ma lags/ phy-ir mi 'ang ba'i bras drag zung bar
72b6(yum): dram lags/ me bzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid gzung ba'i srad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ rang byang chub gzung

72b8(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ mi gzung ba'i slad dri bstan pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzugs so// bdag ni gzugs can no// bdag

72b10(yum): gi rnam par shes pa'o// bdag gis rnam par shes par bya'o// bdag gi mig go// bdag gis blta bar bya'o// bdag gi rno ba'o// dag gis thos par bya'o// dag sngag/ sa

72b12(yum): dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni gi sgra'o// bdag ni nyan par bya'o// dag gi dri'o// bdag ni bsgom pa'o// bdag gi ro'o// bdag ni ro myong ba'o// bdag ni reg go// bdag ni rig par byed bya/

72b14(yum): papo/ bdag ni sna'i rnam par shes pa can no// bdag gi lce rnam sa la/ rnam par shes pa'o// dag ni lce rnam par shes pas no/ dag gi lus kyi rnam pas

72b16(yum): 'jus te rig pa can no// dag gi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// dag ni rnam pa'i 'dus te reg pa can no// dag gi sde'i 'dus te reg pa'o// dag ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa

72b19(yum): byams pa chen po gzung ba'i srad du ma lags/ mi gzu ba'i skad du bstan pa ma lags/ snying rje chen po gzung ba'i srid du ma lag sa/ mi gzung ba'i sradang de bstan pa mngan/

73b1(yum): no bdag gi lce'i 'dus 'das te reg pa'o// bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa can no// bdag gi lus kyi 'das te reg pa'o// du dbus kyi dus te reg pa yin

74a4(yum): tshor bar byed pa'o// bdag gi spo ba'o// bdag ni sred par byed pa'o// bdag gi len pa'o// bdag ni len pa can no// bdag gi srid pa'o// bdag ni srid pa can no// bdag gi skye
74a5(yum): ba'o// bdag ni skye ba'i chos can no// bdag gin sho'o// bdag ni rga sha'i chos can no// bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis sbyin pa'i b.ral tu phyin
74a6(yum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag ga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag go brgya
74a7(yum): ba'i ba rol du phyin pa'o// bdag gis banang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// dag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi
74a8(yum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis bsam gang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdog pa can
74b1(yum): bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs sa rdzogs par bya'o// bdag ga nang stong pa da// 'dun

74b24(yum): stong pa nyid do// bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la goms pa
