366b5(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/ gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rdo rje
366b6(yum): snyam du sems/ chos gang khyod kyis mthong ba'i chos de dmigs su yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
366b7(yum): ba/ rab 'byor de ji la snyam du sems/ chos gang dmigs su med pa de skye ba'am 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan
366b8(yum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang
367a1(yum): gachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pan/ semasangs rgyas bcom ldam das kyis rgan med pa yadadas par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu yang bskrun te/ rangab gyur
367a2(yum): skabs bcu dang / mi'i rigs pa pa ni dngas so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes byaste/ la mder nugs pa'i byang chub sems das
367a3(yum): sems dpa' chen pa di ltar srud pa de ltar rtsol te/ de ltar 'bad pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cings
367a4(yum): par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas med do/ de ci 'byor ne na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/
367a5(yum): de'i chos de ngag ni dz+nyAn med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'bring bar mi 'gyur ro/ rab 'byor kyis
367a6(yum): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos thams cad kyi mi skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de blan med pa yang das par
367a7(yum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyilas
367a8(yum): skye ba'ang ma lags/ mi skye ba'ang ma lags pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan tam
367b1(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis ka' stsal ba/ rab 'byar de ni ma yinapa/ gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das pal de skye ba yang dag ma lags/ mgri ba yang ma lang
367b2(yum): ba las kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstanan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
367b3(yum): bo ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de cis ma
367b4(yum): du sems gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de la bu khyed kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ gsol pa
367b5(yum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tu lung
367b6(yum): snyan par 'gyur ba'i ros de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon
367b7(yum): pang rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa de lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
367b8(yum): de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa/ 'di snyam du sems te 'di mngon par rdzogs
368a1(yum): / par 'chang rgya bar bya'o// 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi sems sa/ deb 'phyir zhe na/ rab 'byur de ni 'di ltar byang chub
368a2(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad med pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
368a3(yum): byin pa ni/ rnam par mchog pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi pa sang phrag brgyab las le'u bani bcu dru 'o// de nas lha'i da bang po brgya byin gyis bcob ldan
368a4(yum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab bo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pan
368a5(yum): shin tu dben pa'i slad du bal dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dben pa'i slad du rtog par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
368a6(yum): phyir pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du bcag tu ma mchis pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring ben pa'i srad du brtag pa'i spyad yul ma lags pa'o// bcom
368a7(yum): ldan 'das ses rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i shin tu dber pa'i srang du ni baphra bzhi ba pa'o// btsam ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro shin tu deben pa'i sring du mkhas cing
368a8(yum): pas tshigs par bgyi ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang gis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'din cing 'dzin ba da / 'chang ning sdol pa dang / kun chub par
368b1(yum): btsung pa dang / des cid dunam du tsung cing / blam med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chungasams du mngan par rdzogs padas sa rgyas
368b2(yum): sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi ma ma byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bajam dang ldan pa ma lags sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/ ko'u shi ka de bzhi ma/ ded 'a
368b3(yum): sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ning klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid du na dang byed
368b4(yum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar tu sems dang sems las 'byung ba'i chos gnar gyi go mi byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i
368b5(yum): rtsabatha ma dang ldan pa ma yin no// ke'u she ka de ci snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldar par
368b6(yum): gyur/ bsam gtan pani dang ldan par gyur chad med pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa'i dang ldan par gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang
368b7(yum): ldan par gyur la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig kyang shes rab kyi rab pha rol du phyin pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed par gyur te/ gzung
368b8(yum): ring bcangs te/ klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed na/ ko'u shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des brgya'i char yang nye
369a1(yum): mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang b+har mi 'gro'o// brgya phrag slong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye ba rami 'gra'o/ bye ba brgya'i char yang
369a2(yum): bar mi 'gro'o/ bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ bye ba brgya phrag srong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
369a3(yum): grangs dang / 'cha' dang 'grang ba dang / dpe' dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ de nas dge slong gcig cig gis lnga'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi
369a4(yum): 'jam bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa pa ni dang ldan pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
369a5(yum): 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab mo 'di mi g.yeng/
369a6(yum): ba'i sems kyis 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tad byed cing / bla na med
369a7(yum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyig mi byed pa de ga gos zil gyis gam
369a8(yum): de sad ces sbas pa dang / lha'idabang po brgya byin gyis dge slong de la 'di sad ces sbas sa/ dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dag ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang lda pa/
369b1(yum): dam gtan pa ni dang / chad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i spoms par 'jug pa pani dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldar pa/ de dag thams cad
369b2(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyer ba nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil gyis nor ma/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
369b3(yum): pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang pa dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / blags
369b4(yum): shing kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ lA dang / mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis dor bar 'gyur
369b5(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
369b6(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang mi dang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rteni zil gyis mngon cing 'gro bar yang mi zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
369b7(yum): chen po de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gang ci snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis non cing 'dra
369b8(yum): bar 'gyur ro/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su ya nga ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
370a1(yum): // dpa' chen pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la smad pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol du sbyin
370a2(yum): mdang bral ba/ de dag zil gyis nor cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa yang ma med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen brjod/
370a3(yum): byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod po/ thabs mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag zil gyis parjo
370a4(yum): cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod por yang mi 'od de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
370a5(yum): pazod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ shes rab kyi la rol tu tshun pa dang bral ba/ bang ji srid pa de dag kyang zil gyisan nga 'thab
370a6(yum): bzod pa'i 'i rol tu phyin pa 'i srud par yang ma 'ad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ba bang bcad 'dus kyis rol/
370a7(yum): tsun pa la gyung ba/ thabs mkhas pa dang bral bshes rab kyi rol du ba la dang bral bkang ci srid pa dag kyang zis rgyas gan cing 'gro bar 'gyur / bca banas kyi
370a8(yum): du phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
370b1(yum): thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba zhes rab tu la ral du byor pa dang bral bgang nga srid pa de sa kyang tshal gyis banan cang 'tha'ar 'brang ra/ bsam gtan gyis ras du thar ba la snang ba
370b2(yum): mthang de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji sad bsan pa bzhi du spyod pa de dag ni/ lha dang mingang lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig ce
370b3(yum): zil gyis mnan par ma nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa spyod pade ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji sang bstan pa dang / 'jur
370b4(yum): par spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i don tu gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
370b5(yum): sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ring du mi byed pa'o// de ltar na zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub dang 'phang 'ang mi 'gyur ro//
370b6(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sems can bying ba rnams 'don par 'dod pa'o// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
370b7(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i slab la bslob te/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la mi slob pa yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi sgrub pa la bslob pa ma yin no// de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
370b8(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te nye bar dong zhing 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobs shig skyes bu
371a1(yum): chen ba sbyin par sa bshog/ ltung ba'ad pan pa 'didas mtshad kyis byang chub tu 'dug te/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngan par rdzabs
371a2(yum): pang sangs rgyas nas drang bar bya'o/ 'di ga sa ci pani ga zhems pa gra ba tsam pa yang das par dgas pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pag/ zhes pa ringags
371a3(yum): de lang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' cha sems dpa' chen po drung du rgyal po bzhid ba kyang / rgyal po chem pa bana'i rig kyi la'i bu rnams
371a4(yum): dang lhan cig 'dod par sems so/ de'i drung du bdag kyang sum bcu brtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu 'gro bar sems so/ lha'i rgyal po rab mche ma yang mche ma'i
371a5(yum): rnams la cig 'grub semasas/ l-I'i rnal ba mdapa' ltan yang kA' ldan rtsala'i bu mas dang ldan sa 'gro ba gams sa/ lha'i rgyal par
371a6(yum): dpa' yang 'phrul pa'i la'i bu mas dang lan bye rgya thobar sems so/ ma'i rgyal ba dang sbyar ma gnan 'phrul dbang byed kyi la khri mas dang lha
371a7(yum): ba sems sa/ ngas pa mi mjed kyi bdag po mdze mtshangs ngas kyi la'i burnams dang ldan ciga'i phra bar sems sa/ kun snad dang be'i l-I rnams kyang ni bar 'a
371a8(yum): sems so/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye rab 'dong bar sems so/ ma che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar
371b1(yum): 'dod par sems sa/ mi bdung pa'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems sa/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems sa/ tha nam snang ba'i lhar
371b2(yum): kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// gnas gcang ma'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
371b3(yum): phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang dgongs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
371b4(yum): pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa'i tshe lus la ni 'jig rter ba'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnon par byas pa gang ci snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus
371b5(yum): lami 'byung mi 'bab te/ dge slong de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyad ba che/ 'di'i yon tad du 'gyur
371b6(yum): bte/ 'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di ltar te/ mig gi nang ngam/ rna ba'i nang ngam/ sna'i mang dam/ lce'i nang ngam/ lus kyi nang dam
371b7(yum): gnad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab te/ 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheran po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
371b8(yum): bzab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byir 'di rang gi smos pa
372a1(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa san cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs par brjod dam/ 'od te sangs rgyas kyi ma
372a2(yum): smon snyam pa dang / de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi rtog pa yongs su shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'dis
372a3(yum): ces sbas so/ btsun pa dga' bo bdag de lar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i man tan legs par brjod
372a4(yum): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo de
372a5(yum): bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon
372a6(yum): dang legs par brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthun/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs sa/ dpa' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems
372a7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin+da pa la sab pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'tshon bar byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol/
372a8(yum): byin pa sdom pa de'i tshe gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud srog to car gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ci nas byang chub sems
372b1(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'ang yang dag pa'i mtha' mngan ba du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig blar 'ad ba'i 'bras zudang /
372b2(yum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
372b3(yum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam te/ dogs pa ste rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
372b4(yum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ 'dud sdig to car mya ngan gyi zug rngu gzug par 'gyur ro// dga' bo zhan yang byang chub sem
372b5(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa
372b6(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa las sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i ram/ zhum par 'gyur ba dang / srugayo' bar 'gyur bar
372b7(yum): sar mda' ltung ba gtong zhing 'jigs pa bskyed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
372b8(yum): lags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad drung du bdud sdig to car 'tshe ba'i bsam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
373a1(yum): pa/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud snying don na 'che ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba yin no/ dga' bos gsol
373a2(yum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi'i bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga
373a3(yum): gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe sems mos par byas pa/ de'i drung du bdud sdig to can 'che ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo //
373a4(yum): dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ 'di shes rab kyi pha
373a5(yum): rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ 'on tam ma yin zhes the tsom du 'gyur ba/ de dag tu gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can 'che ba'o bas pas nye bar 'ong ngo // dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
373a6(yum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma thos so// mthos pas mi shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
373a7(yum): ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nam tar mi byed de/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig no can gyis glags brnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo na
373a8(yum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thal la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par byed na/ dga' bo byang chub sems
373b1(yum): dpa' ngal yang bdud sasas can gyis thabs dang par 'gyur / dka' ba ba'an yang shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa dang bral da'i byang chub sems dpa 'dam pa'i chas ma sa
373b2(yum): la bsrags pa brjod de/ del bdud sdig ta can 'dis ma du sems te/ gang dam pa'i nas ma yin pa'i bsngags pa ska ba ni bdas ni thams pa man te/ pa dam pa'i chos ma
373b3(yum): yod pa'i smras pa suba'ang byang chub sems dpa'i zag pa mang pa'i nang nas bdag pas chags sa dang pag/ de ltar brgyas byang chub sems dpa'i thab pa pa la 'das
373b4(yum): rdzas sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sa las tsag tu gnas par gyur pa ni bdag gis bsam pa yongs sun zhes par bar byed ba'i snyamaH/ dpa' ba byung chu
373b5(yum): sems dpa'adil yang bdud ston cacan gyis thabs da par 'gyur ro/ dga' ba gnam yang byang chub sems dpa' ji la bul bdud kyis thabs rnyed par 'gyur che
373b6(yum): byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mo 'ang bsar pa' 'di snyed du shes rab kyi pha rol
373b7(yum): tu phyin pa na shin tu 'bas/ khyod kyis shes rab ral tu phyin pa 'ab ma 'ang thos pas
373b8(yum): bskam pa dang / bzung ba dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pas zhig byangs kyang de'i gting
374a1(yum): ma rnyed na/ khyod kyis lha rnyed re skan zhes zer na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' del yang bdud sdig to can blugs rnyeng par 'gyur ro// dga'
374a2(yum): gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas bskyed cing / de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// ngani
374a3(yum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa// da ni bson gtan gyi
374a4(yum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
374a5(yum): spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa mo yin no// khyod brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
374a6(yum): phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par ma yin no// zhes rlom sems su byed ra/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig te can
374a7(yum): gyis grags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub semasadapa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems skyed na/ dga' bo de'i tshe bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang spong dang
374a8(yum): nyams bde ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim ning yid bde ba skyes par 'gyur te/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la yang bdud sdig to can gyis blags rnyed par 'gyur ro// dag
374b1(yum): bganan yang gang gi che/ byang chub sems dpa' ming brjod pa'am/ rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na/ de ming brjod pa'am/ rus brjod pa'am/ des byang chub sems dpa'
374b2(yum): sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du bsod cing / bdag stong gzhan spong la/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul das
374b3(yum): mtshan par bya ba'i yon tan dag kyang del med par rnam pa dang / chul dab mchen ma med pade dag gos nyon mengs papo skyid cing / bdag stong gzhar spong de 'digang dung ltar dbyang chubs mas/
374b4(yum): dang brdeg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par ma spang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i rigs par las gas
374b5(yum): par mi snang // zhes de ltar gang bab byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de dag la mi snyan par rjod cing smod na de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gnas ni stongs par ri 'gyur
374b6(yum): sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / byol sang gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes ci sa kyang de'i tshe tshig gzung
374b7(yum): du rung bar 'gyur bde ltar bdud cig to can byang chub sems dpa'ad byin gyis rlob te/ de'i tshig bzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang / yod ches par bya bar sems te//
374b8(yum): de'i de dag gis thos sam/ mthong na 'thun par spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag gis thos sam mthong nas mthun par spyod cing / de bzhin dus pa ti de dag de bzhin du slob pa'i che/ de bzhi na nga/
376a1(yum): du thong cing / de bzhin nyid dunan tud byed pa'am/ tsan mongs pa shin tu 'dil bar 'gyur// de ltar de dag pasam pa phyin gyilag myu pas/ lus
376a2(yum): gdu/ yid kyilas gang ngo ba rtsams pa mas cad kyi 'ding ba dang / mi stug dang / yid du mi 'di bar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de ltar nasems can da la la chen po dag kyang ra /
376a3(yum): 'phel bar 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi lus yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/ bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas
376a4(yum): dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong nas/ bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde' ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub
376a5(yum): sems dpa'i theg pa gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / brjod cing dang ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi/ khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/ de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/ kyer/
376a6(yum): kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zab mo dang 'khrug pa
376a7(yum): dang rtsod pa dang / 'tshang 'bru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/ de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo// de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo//
376a8(yum): de nagashin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lam mo// de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gong zag byang chub sems
376b1(yum): dpa'i theg pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dnga'athug pa can gnan du 'thab cang myong la/ 'jug cing mchang 'dun de bdud sngagata can 'dis ma dus pas// 'diganyis ga yangs
376b2(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa'o// 'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya'o// de ci'i phyir zher/ 'dre
376b3(yum): ltar rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyilam ma yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi sku
376b4(yum): gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig kyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lu
376b5(yum): bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa la gnod par sems shing / 'thab cing cod la 'khrug cing 'chang 'drun/ gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing
376b6(yum): yongs su mi gtang zhe na/ ci tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing brtsod pa dang / 'khrug cing 'chang 'dru bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bskal par go cha go bar
376b7(yum): bya'o// dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam/ 'on te ma lags kyis bskal pa de rnyed kho nar go chang ga
376b8(yum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' theg pa rnams la
377a1(yum): par 'byung ba dang / bcas pa'i chos bstan te/ dge ba de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i gang zag dang 'ja
377a2(yum): cing cor la gshe zhing mi snyan du brjod pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod pa byas nas/ phyir mi chags par mdud par 'dzin cing 'khor tu bzung ste/ gnas na
377a3(yum): dga' bo gang zag de ni 'byung bar mi swA te/ gang dag des gal te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtang zhe na/ gdor mi ba rab tu bskal pa de snyed du go cha 'go
377a4(yum): 'o// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zab cing brtsod de gshe shing mi snyan par brjod par gyur na yang mdud par mi 'dzin la// byin cang sdom pa
377a5(yum): 'dzin cing bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par tho ba ste/ bdag gis sems can thams cad sdug bsngal bsal dgos na/ de ltar bdag smrab la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis
377a6(yum): sems can thams cad kyi dam par gyur bya dgos // de ltar bdag gzhan la mi snyan par sma ni zlogs pa ni/ mi tshul gyis bdag gis de ltar mo bya'o// bdag gis glen pa
377a7(yum): dang / lkugs pa bzhin du bya'o// bdag gi bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o// sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
377a8(yum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yongs su mya ngan las zla bar bya dgos na/ de dag cid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis
377b1(yum): bdagags de dgas gdang sems su ma byab// bdag gis de dag pa 'khrug par ma bya snyaman/ dga' 'a byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'acher bar 'byung ba lang bar
377b2(yum): bshad de/ des bdud sngon ta can grags la nung grags ma rnyed do// dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dgatan thos kyi theg pa dag
377b3(yum): 'grogs par mabya'o// de dag deng lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o// 'dug par mi bya'o// gal te 'dug yang des sul yang gnod sems su bya'o// 'jun
377b4(yum): par ma bya dzi cong byer nan/ gang bdag gis de dag la gnang sems su ma bya ba dang / 'jug par bya ba doni bdag la ma tshul la// daci phyi na/ 'di snang ba/
377b5(yum): gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar bya bdag snyam du bya'o// dag
377b6(yum): bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ngag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya/ bcom ldan 'dra
377b7(yum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge' bo 'di lta ste dper na ston pa la ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems da 'i
377b8(yum): theg pa dang gnas par bya ste// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bdag gi grogs pa ste/ grucig tu tshugs pa'o// 'dis ci ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslang
378a1(yum): bar bya'o// 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtsod 'grus kyi pha rol tu
378a2(yum): byin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / bye stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang
378a3(yum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'as so 'das pa stong pa nyid dang zag ma dang tham medapa
378a4(yum): stong pa nyid dang / dor bamed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang ba'i ni stong pa nyid dang / rnaMs thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan med kyang nyid dang / mi dmigs pa snang banyid dag/
378a5(yum): dngo slo bo med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba dang bani dang / rdzu 'phrul
378a6(yum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
378a7(yum): btan bzhi dang / tshad med pa na dang / gzugs med pa'i rnams 'jug pa pan dang / rnam par tha ba brgyad dang / mthang gyig nas pa pa rnams par 'dug pa dag nga/ rnam pa
378a8(yum): pa'ig stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spod pa med pa dang / mngon pa shes lnga dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sa thams cad dang / deng ni sa
378b1(yum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bco brgyad dang /
378b2(yum): thams cad thos pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bya ba de nyid la bdag gis bslab par bya'o snyam du sems skyed par dug
378b3(yum): des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar skyed par bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ste/ gal te de 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
378b4(yum): yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na/ de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yongs bya
378b5(yum): dang ma bral bar gnas na bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyod de// de ltar bslob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bslab pa mnyam
378b6(yum): pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bani bcu bdun no// / dum dung cu pa bam po nyi rgyu ni bcu'i gyi grub pa'o//

378b8(yum): par bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub
379a1(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
379a2(yum): kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor stong pa nyid ni byang chub sem

379a8(yum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
379b1(yum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ngo // rab 'byor pa

379b4(yum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs ni gzugs stong ngo // tshor ba ni chor
379b5(yum): stong / 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong // 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong // rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong // mogo ni mig gis stong // rnga ba ni rnabs
379b6(yum): stod// sA ni snas stong / lce ni lces stong // lus ni lus kyis stong // yid ni yid kyis stong // gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong // sgra ni sgras stong // dri ni dris
379b7(yum): stong/ ni ris stong // reg ni rig gis stong // chos ni chos chos kyis stong // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong // rje ba'i rnam par shes
379b8(yum): nirna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong // chu'i rnam par shes pani lce'i rnam par shes pas stong // lus kyi rnam par/
380a1(yum): shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong // yid kyi rnam par shes pas ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus
380a2(yum): te reg pas stong // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnga ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ri sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong
380a3(yum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong // mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te
380a4(yum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor rabs stong / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshe rabs stong / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyedan kyis tshor ba ni/
380a5(yum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor pas stong / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ gro'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsho

380a7(yum): khams kyis stong / chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong // mo'i khams ni mo'i khams kyis stong // rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong // nam mkha'i khams ni nam ma
380a8(yum): kyis stong // rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong // ma rig pa'i ma rig pas spong // 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong // rnam par shes pa ni rnam par
380b1(yum): zas stong mang dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong // skye mched drug na skye mched drug gis stong // reg pa na rig pas stong // tshor ba na tshe rabs spong // sred par sred pas rung
380b2(yum): yin pa ni len pas stong // srid pa ni srid pas stong // skye ba ni skyobs srung // ne ni ni rgashes stong // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyir pas stong // tshul khrim
380b3(yum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stod// bdod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas snang // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyir bar/ brtson 'dus
380b4(yum): kyi pharal tu phyin pas stong // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bsam gtan gyipha rol tu phyin pas stong // shes kyi rab tu phyin par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pas pom
380b5(yum): nang stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyis stong // phyi stong pa nyid na phyi stong pa nyid kyis spyod// byi nang stong pa nyid ni byi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong/ stong cing sdong po nyid ni stong pasad
380b6(yum): kyis stong // chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis spong / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong stong pa nyid kyis stong // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus stong pa nyid
380b7(yum): kyis spong // 'dubs stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong // thog ma dang tham med
380b8(yum): bstong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis
381a1(yum): stob chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis sto
381a2(yum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
381a3(yum): kyis stong // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong // yang dge par
381a4(yum): spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong // dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong // stob
381a5(yum): rnams ni stobs rnams stong // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ni byang chub kyi yan lagi rnams kyis stong / lam ri lam gyis stong // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams de 'phas
381a6(yum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyis sdong // bsam gtan rnams de bsam gtan rnams kyis spong // chad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong // gzugs med pa'i rnams pa
381a7(yum): 'dug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong// rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong // mthar gyis gnas pa kyi sems par 'gyu
381a8(yum): pa rnams sa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong // rnam par thar pa sa na stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / skrod pa med par/ rnam par thar pa'i
381a9(yum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag n+d+hi 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya kyi
381b1(yum): blang ba cang dang / mtshan ma meng pa dang / smod pa med pam stong // sang par shes pa rnams mngad pa shes pa rnams byas stong // nga de 'ang dam ma tang nga 'dzin rnapas kya rna
381b2(yum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis snang // de bzhi gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rang bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs rnams byas stong / mi 'jigs pa rnams pa 'angasas
381b3(yum): brnams spyong // sas yang dag par rig pa rnams rnams yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong // snying rje chen par stong rdzi che pos stong // sangs rgyas kyi lal 'dres pa rnams

381b7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de// de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
381b8(yum): rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slobar/ rnam pa thams cad
382b1(yum): pa'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags

382b7(yum): sam/ mig mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slobar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyod pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna babs par bgyi bo'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
382b8(yum): slob pa lags sam/ rnab 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rna ba 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob ra/
382a1(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi pa'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags

382a5(yum): sam/ tshor ba mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du shes pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad

382a8(yum): nyid du slong pa lags sam/ 'du byed pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'du byed 'dod chags dang bral bar brgya
383a1(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnab mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slobar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong pa lags sam/
383a2(yum): snabs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sna 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

383a6(yum): lags sam/ lho mo skye bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
383a7(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slob ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus 'gag par
383a8(yum): bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lus mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dus
383b1(yum): bsags sam/ yi bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slobar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du slong ma rnam
383b2(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du spong ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong pa lags sam/ yid mi skye bar brgya

390a6(yum): du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid duslob pa lags sam/ len pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
390a7(yum): sring babs par 'gyi 'i srang du slong ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong pa lags sa pa/ srid pa 'dong chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slong du srong ma/ rnamapa
390a8(yum): thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du sring po lags sam/ sring pa 'gag par 'gyi ba'i slad du spong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa ma/ srid ngami skyeng
390b1(yum): 'a ba'i srang dus pam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nying du slob pa lags pam/ sgrubabs par bgyi babaslang dus pas/ rnam pa thams sa dmabyed pa dang dang
390b2(yum): sam/ skye 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ skye ba 'gag par 'chi ba'i srad du spong na/ rnab sa
390b3(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ skyebo mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rga shi bas par dgyed
390b4(yum): skad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong lags sam/ rga shi 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
390b5(yum): rga shi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rga shi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i srang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
390b6(yum): ba lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags
390b7(yum): dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slobo na/ rnam pa thams
390b8(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshul khrims
391a1(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa
391a2(yum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du
391a3(yum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
391a4(yum): du slob pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bzod pa rol tu phyin
391a5(yum): pa'adod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du spong ba lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du spongan
391a6(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du slob pa lags

391a8(yum): chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i srong du srong na/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rab tu phyin pa 'geg par bkyil ba srang
391b1(yum): spong na/ rnam pa thams cad pa khyed pa cid du slob pa lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi par sa tung rab tu phyin pa ma skye bar bgyi ba bsrang du slob/ rnam pa thams sa dam
391b2(yum): bcad du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bas par bgyi ba'i srad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam pa

391b4(yum): ba'i slang du slong ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad

391b6(yum): byin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i
391b7(yum): srong du slo na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i srang du slongab na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa/
391b8(yum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slang du slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags
392a1(yum): dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams ca mkhyed pa nying du slob lags sa pa/ rang stong pa nyid 'gag par bkri ba'i srung du
392a2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong pa lags sam/ nang stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du slong pa lags sam/ phyi stong po nyid
392a3(yum): bas par bgyi ba'i srang du slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying du slob pa lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i srang du slobar/ rnam pa thams cad

392a8(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stong pa sad stong pa se bas par bgyi ba'i srang du srong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po lags sam/ snang ba nyid /
392b1(yum): bsad 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyi ba'i srad du spong ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyod pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par 'am bab spang dunam

393a8(yum): par bgyi ba'i slad du srong ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slang du srong ma/ rnam pa rnams
393b1(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnan

393b3(yum): par bgyi ba'i slangad du slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tham med po stong pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slang du slo na/ rnam pa thams
393b4(yum): cang mkhyen pa nyid du slob ba lags sam/ dor bamed pa snang ba nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slo ba na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyedan pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dor bamed pa

393b7(yum): logasas pa/ rang bzhin stong panying bas par bgyi ba'i srang du sa ngan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa leg sos ma/ rang bzhin stong ba nyid 'dong chags dang bral
393b8(yum): bar bgyi ba'i srang du slo na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i

394a7(yum): mtshan cid stong pa kod mo skye bar brtse ba'i srang du sapas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma pa lags sam/ maud chags pa snang ba nyid pas par 'gyi ba'i srang dus pan/
394a8(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing du slob pa lags sam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'dod tshigs dang bram par bgyi ba'i srang du srong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma
394b1(yum): lags sam/ mi migs pa stong pacir 'gag par bgyi ba'i slang du slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mi dmigs pa spong pa nyid pa skye bar
394b2(yum): ba'i srang du slongs rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dngos pa med pasnang bgyid pas par bgyi ba'i srang du slobam/ rnam pa thams cad pakhyen mkhye

394b4(yum): med da byeng 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slong ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgrub pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa song bskad mi smra bar 'gyi ba'i slad du spobs
394b5(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rdo rje

395a8(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slang du slobar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyidapa/
395b1(yum): pa bzhibs par bgyi ba'i slad du slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bani 'dod chags dang rnal bar bgyi ba'i slang du 'ang
395b2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slopa pa lags sam/ rdzu baphrul gyi nang pa mini 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sa pa

395b6(yum): slob pa lags sam/ stobs ldabs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i srid
395b7(yum): du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ stobs lnga 'gag par bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
395b8(yum): stobs lnga ma skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun pas par ba slad du slongab na/ rnam pa tham
396a1(yum): cang mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi man lag bdun 'dod chags dang bral bar bzla pa'i srad du slong na/ rnam pa thams cad pakhye
396a2(yum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi ya na log bdun 'gag par bgyi ba'i srang du srong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyedan pa cad du slob pa lags sa ma/ byang chub kyi yan lang
396a3(yum): bdun mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pabs par bgyi ba'i slad du slong na/ rnam pa
396a4(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
396a5(yum): ba lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam
396a6(yum): yan lag brgyad pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i srang du srong ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa brdebs par bgyi ba'i srangad du slob na/
396a7(yum): rnam pa mas cad ma byed pa nga du chu pa lags sam/ 'bugs papa bded pa pani 'ad chogs dang thas par gyi ba'i srang du srongs/ rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa dus
396a8(yum): lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhim
396b1(yum): skye nga bya ba'i slang du mangs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa car du spab pa lags sam/ bsam ga tan brnabs par bgyi ba'i srang du slong sa rnam pa thams cad babyer pas
396b2(yum): duslob lags sa so/ bsam gtan pan 'dang chags dang bral bar bgyi bslang du ma ngan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob pa lags sam/ bas gta 'i
396b3(yum): 'gag par bgyi ba'i slasrad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan bani mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed
396b4(yum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chang med pa bzhibs par bgyi ba'i skad du spro bar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ chang med pa bani 'dod chags
396b5(yum): dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshad med pa bzhi 'gag por bgyi ba'i slang du slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
396b6(yum): nyid du slob pa lags sam/ tshing med pa bani ma skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du sra ngam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
396b7(yum): brnabs par bgyi ba ba srang du srong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i sdoms par 'jug pa pani 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ste/
396b8(yum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams
397a1(yum): cad mkhyer pa nyid du srong pa lags sapa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'azhi mi skye bar bgyi ba'i srang du srong ma/ rngam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
397a2(yum): slob pa lags sapa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad pas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dod chags dang
397a3(yum): bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
397a4(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slong ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/ mthar gyis gan
397a5(yum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chag
397a6(yum): dang bral bar bgyi ba'i srang du skyong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sapa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bgyi ba'i sring du songan/
397a7(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i srang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
397a8(yum): pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
397b1(yum): dam par thar pa'i ma snang ba ci dang mtshan ma med pa dang spyor pa med pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob sa/ rnam pa thams cad pa byed pa nyid du slob pa lags sapa/
397b2(yum): rnam par thar ba'i ma stong ngab dang / mtshan med pa dang sman pa med pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rnam pa nga
397b3(yum): nga'agro stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa ma skye bur bgyi ba'i slad du slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams bas par 'gyi 'i
397b4(yum): srang du slong na/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
397b5(yum): pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnam
397b6(yum): mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
397b7(yum): nyid du slob pa lags sa maM/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin
397b8(yum): rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lag so sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
398a1(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
398a2(yum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gog par bgyi ba'i slad
398a3(yum): du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi skye bar bgyi po'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du spong pa lags
398a4(yum): sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bos par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod
398a5(yum): chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slongab na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong pa lags sapa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par 'gyi ba'i slad du slong na/
398a6(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lag
398a7(yum): sam/ mi 'jigs pa bzhibs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mi 'jigs pa bani 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i sla
398a8(yum): du slong ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/ mi 'jigs pa 'ani 'gag par bgyi ba'i srad du slongab na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
398b1(yum): ma 'jigs par mam skye bar bgying bsrang duslo bar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ mas yang dag par rig pa panabs par 'thar 'i snang /
398b2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sam/ mas yang dag par rig pa ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po'i
398b3(yum): slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa ban
398b4(yum): mi skye bar bgyi ba'i srang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
398b5(yum): slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po 'gag par brgya
398b6(yum): ba'i slad du slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po ma skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slobar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sa/
398b7(yum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'dod
398b8(yum): chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
399a1(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du spong ra/ rnam pa thams
399a2(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bas par bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du srong po lags sam/ rgyun tu zhug
399a3(yum): pa'i 'bras bu 'dod rigs dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rgyud tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i gag par bgyi ba'i slad du
399a4(yum): slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sapa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sbyin du slob pa
399a5(yum): lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bubs par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
399a6(yum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du smo
399a7(yum): narnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i srang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa med dus
399a8(yum): pa lags sam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bubs par bgyi ba'i slang du slong ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phying ba 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod chos
399b1(yum): dang ngas par 'artsa ba bslang dum ngan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thob pa lagasas ma/ phyir mi 'ang ba'i 'bras du 'gag par 'bya ba'i spang du slo ma dang nga
399b2(yum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags som/ dgra bcom pa ni
399b3(yum): bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa tham

399b5(yum): pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub bas par bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'i
399b6(yum): du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub 'gag par bgyi ba'i
399b7(yum): slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ rang byang chub mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
399b8(yum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slang du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid 'dod chags dang dras lnga
400a1(yum): bgyi ba'i slad du slob ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/
400a2(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/
400a3(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong po lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod chags dang
400a4(yum): bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa legs sa pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/ rnam pa tham

400a6(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya // dum bu bcu / bam pa nya rgya ni brtsam gyupa/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi
400a7(yum): 'phrul pa/ rab 'byor de ma yin te/ gnas brtan dang 'byor gyis gang 'diskad du/ gzugs padapar bya ba phyir slo / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cang
400a8(yum): pa yin nam/ gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slong ma/ rnam pa thams cid mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin napa/ gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slobs
400b1(yum): rnamang thams cad pabyed pa nyid du slong pa yin nam/ gzugs mo skye bar byang 'phyar slo / rnam pa thams cad mabyer pa cing du slob pa yad ram/ tshor babang bar byung ba gyu

401a1(yum): rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir spong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa 'gag /

403a4(yum): sna'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa

403a6(yum): shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa gag par bya ba'i phyir slob ra/ rnam
403a7(yum): pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nom/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyis
403a8(yum): par shes pa bang par bya ba'i phyir srob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir gribs
403b1(yum): rnam thams sa dum byed pa du sgrub pa yin napa/ lus kyirnam par shes pa dag ga dar byung 'drar thobs rnam pa mas sa mamyed papa du sgrung pa med dag su
403b2(yum): rnam par shes pa ma skye bar bya ba 'phyir slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slobar/ rnam pa thams cad brjed
403b3(yum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bye ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa
403b4(yum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
403b5(yum): slob pa yin nas// mig gi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar phye
403b6(yum): ba'i phyir slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yon
403b7(yum): nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob ni/ rnam
403b8(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam//
404a1(yum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin ram/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya
404a2(yum): ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob ra/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
404a3(yum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob
404a4(yum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus
404a5(yum): te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
404a6(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin napa/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi skye
404a7(yum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slo na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
404a8(yum): dus pa pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'did chags deng thal bar bya ba'i phyir slob sa/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyed rje cang du slob pa yin ram/ lus kyi 'dus
404b1(yum): reg pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir spong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir srong na/ rnab pa thams
404b2(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yir ram/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slobar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong pa yi ram/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'
404b3(yum): chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slong ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du snying po yin nas/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa 'gago par bya ba'i phyir slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad
404b4(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du stong pa yin ram/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa po skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa
404b5(yum): las byung ba'i tshor bzad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang
404b6(yum): bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las 'byung ba'i tshor ba 'gog par bya ba'i phyir slob ra/ rnam
404b7(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe rang mo skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
404b8(yum): yin ram/ rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor bzad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
405a1(yum): las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus
405a2(yum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'bog par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi skye bar
405a3(yum): bya ba'i phyir slong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin ram/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bzad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad
405a4(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg po las byung ba'i tshor ba 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
405a5(yum): yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las

405a8(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slong pa yin nam/ sgo'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slongab pa yin nam

405b7(yum): ba'i tshor ba 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir/
405b8(yum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ sa'i khams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/

409b7(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ nang stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na mo/ phyi stong pa

410a3(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yon nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byinang stong
410a4(yum): nying 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
410a5(yum): du slob pa yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin namo/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang
410a6(yum): thal bar bya ba'i phyir slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir srong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

410b1(yum): duslob pa yin nam/ cher ba stong panyingad 'gag par bya ba phyir srong ma rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid du spang ba yin dam/ ched ba gang pa sang ma na byang dru nga
410b2(yum): phyir slob ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du sgo
410b3(yum): po yin nam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slobar/ rnam pa thams cad maldon pa nyid du slob pa yin napa/ don dam pa snying po 'i

415a8(yum): nas mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag par bya ba'i phyir srong na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid duslob pa yin nam/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyi sa ban/ rnams
415b1(yum): mas pa dab byed pa cing dusrapa payin dam/ ting nge 'dzini rnams pad par bya ba'i phyiras ban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing dum pa ma'i pa/ 'di rnams 'dang dgas pa
415b2(yum): bar bya ba'i phyira'i slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag par phyir slo ba na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rje
415b3(yum): 'dzin rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nid
415b4(yum): du sgrub pa yin na pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dusrab pa yin napa/ gzungs kyi so rnams 'gag par bya
415b5(yum): ba'i slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lani nam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
415b6(yum): de ba zhi gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhini gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dod chags dang bral ba/
415b7(yum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
415b8(yum): slob pa yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir/
416a1(yum): slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ mi 'jigs pa ba ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni

416a3(yum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ so so yang dag pa

416a6(yum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen porjod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dus ngab
416a7(yum): yin nam/ snying rje chen po 'gag par bya ba'i phyir srapa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ snying rje chen po ma skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
416a8(yum): shing du slob pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chom 'dres pa bco bcung zad par bya ba'i phyir srangan/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dusrab pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba
416b1(yum): tung bdang cags dang bral bar bya ba phyi ma ban/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa tshang dus pa pa yini napa/ sangs rgyas kyichis ma 'dres pa bca btung 'gag par bya ba'i bying sangam

416b3(yum): pa'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du srab pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa tham
416b4(yum): cang mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin napa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras

416b8(yum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ byor mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dod cag

421b1(yum): skye ba 'am/ skye 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram// mthar gyis
421b2(yum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa
421b3(yum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zang
421b4(yum): pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gzungs mi rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/
421b5(yum): spang ba 'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur rab/
421b6(yum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yid pa de zad pa'am
421b7(yum): spang ba'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ snying rje chen po'i di bzhin nyid gang yid pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ sangs rgyas kyi ning
421b8(yum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am//
422a1(yum): spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba'am/
422a2(yum): 'gag par 'gyur ram/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhini nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga
422a3(yum): yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/
422a4(yum): lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/ spang ba'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lani bde
422a5(yum): zad pa'am/ spang ba 'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
422a6(yum): gyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ de banin
422a7(yum): shing zang pa'am sa ba'am/ skye 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba med de/ rab 'byor deltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ning bzhini ma slob paste/ mapa
422a8(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang
422b1(yum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i 'arob tu
422b2(yum): phyin pa la sdong pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brtsod 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chu
422b3(yum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar spong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
422b4(yum): phyin pa la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na ning stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
422b5(yum): sems dpa' chen por phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de
422b6(yum): slob ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spang pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen baspyod pa
422b7(yum): nying la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa na/ rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sa
