453a6(yum): can dben pa'o// rga shing ben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
453a7(yum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// bzong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dber pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// brgyan 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems
453a8(yum): can dben pa'o// bsem gtan gyi rab tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dpon pa'o// / shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//
453b1(yum): nga pa 'i sams dang ban par// rtswa spang pa cid dben par phyir sems na nga byed par// byu nang sa pa stong ba 'gyus smra
453b2(yum): mdza ci song pa nyid ben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// chen bstong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// don dam pa sang pa nyid nga ben pa'i phyir sems
453b3(yum): ze pa// 'das byas srung ba'i ben pa'i phyir sems can dben par// 'dus ma byas srung pa nyid dben pa'i byur sems cad 'an pa'o//
453b4(yum): bsadzo cing dben pa'i phyir sems dben pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// dor ba med pa snang pa nyid nga ben pa'i phyir ma
453b5(yum): can dben pa'o// rang ba nini spang ba nyid dang dben pa'i phyir sems can dben par/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can ben pa'o// rang gi ma
453b6(yum): snang pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// dngos po med pa spong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems
453b7(yum): nad dazed dag/ dza tha~Mn nga sang pa nyid da ben pa'i phyir sems can dben pag// dngos po med pa'i nga za zhing snang pa nyid nga bad pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rnarnam
453b8(yum): nye bar gnag pa rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams dben pa'i phyir sems ca dben pa'o// rdzu 'phrul nang pa bzhi dben pa'i
454a1(yum): sems can dben pa'o// dbang po lnga dben pa'i phyi sems can dben pa na// skabs ldang ben pa'i phyi sems can dben pa'o// byang chub kyi lanal
454a2(yum): bdun ben pa'i phyi sems can dben pag// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brtad pa ben pa'i phyi sems nang zed pa'o// 'phags pa'i bde pa ni byin pa'i
454a3(yum): dben pa'o// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// tshad med pa pa ni dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
454a4(yum): bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben pa'i phyir
454a5(yum): sems can dben pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshad ma med pa'i phyir dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams
454a6(yum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// de bzhin/
454a7(yum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcur ben pa'i phyir sems can dben par/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ben pa'i phyir sems can dben par// sa so yang dag par rig pa bani dben pa'i phyi
454a8(yum): sems can dben pa'o// sring chen pong dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya dang ben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// rgyun tu cam
454b1(yum): la nga ga/ ma pa thas ngas ma / sa
454b2(yum): dbang pag/ dkya ma pa 'i be pa byi sems cad byed par// pabyang du ba ba par mams cad pa pal// ngam ma pa shes
454b3(yum): pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa rngam tha bcus pa/ nyis brgya
454b4(yum): gzugs dben pa'i byor sems can shes rab kyi la tu phyi bang bdapag// tshar ba dpon pa'i phyir shes rab kyi sa phyin pa rnyen pag/
454b5(yum): ba'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa dpon pa'i phyir ges rab kyi pa ra tu phyir ba 'i
454b6(yum): ba tshi gang ban pa'i phyir shos bkyi ral tu phyin par ben pa'o// dbang ben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ral tu phyin pa dben pa'o// snang ben pa'i dri shes rab kyi sa
454b7(yum): pa dben pa'o// lce dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ba dben pa'o// lus dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// yi dben pa'i phyir shes rab gyi/
454b8(yum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sbrad ben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dring ben pa'i phyi/
455a1(yum): shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rong dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// re ga ben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
455a2(yum): dben par chos dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rdo rnam pa
455a3(yum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa ben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidan pa dben pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes par ba
455a4(yum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dber pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i
455a5(yum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes
455a6(yum): rab kyi la phyin pa dben par// sna'i 'dus te ga pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu pang ban pas// lce'i 'dus te ga pa dzin pa'i phyir shes rabakyi
455a7(yum): phyin pa dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ram du phyin pa dben pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te rig par dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ram du phyin pa sa
455a8(yum): ba'o// mig gi 'dus ti ga pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba dben pa'i phyi
455b1(yum): rab kyi ral tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rab tu phyin par byed par// lce'i 'dus te dag pa las byung ba
455b2(yum): ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// yid
455b3(yum): 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshar ba ben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ra ma phyin pa dben pad+mo// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa ba dpag/
455b4(yum): khams dber pa'i phyi gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mo'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dper pa'o// rlung gi khams dber ba'i phyi na
455b5(yum): kya ral tu phyin pa dben pa'o// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes kyi bangos
455b6(yum): ba byed pa'o// ma rig pa ben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa ba na
455b7(yum): phyi gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mi dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir shes rabagyib sa
455b8(yum): bang banapal reg par ban pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rob tu phyin pa dbe pa'o// sred pa dben pa'i phyir ni/
456a1(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// len pa ben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// srid pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
456a2(yum): dben par skyeb dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rga shing be pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ros tu phyin pang ben pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ban
456a3(yum): phyi shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir
456a4(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes
456a5(yum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
456a6(yum): par briso pa'iding dben pa'i phyi shes rab kyi ram tu phyin pa dben pa'o// phyi nang sang pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa ben pa'o// stong ba zhi sang pa 'iding na pagyi
456a7(yum): phyir shes rab kyi rol phyi bang byed pam// chen pa srung pa ding ben pa'i dri nas rab kyi pa ram tu phyin pa ba pal// dadang pa pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyi shes rab kyi pa ma tu
456a8(yum): padaben pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyidi dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyiri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
456b1(yum): sa sa nga par byams rgyu dang 'a dul// gas ma mang pa tha pa da sa kyi tshu @
456b2(yum): rang ba yang pa sang pa dang ben pa'i phyi shes rab kyi ras tu spyon par dben pa'o// 'du ba na na sang pa sang nga med pa'i byor gas rab kyi pa sbyin par ban sa sa
456b3(yum): spang pa ding byin pa byong gas rab kyi sa phyin pa bang por/ rang gi rten cing srung pa sa dang bye pa'i phyir shes pa sa rdzun pa byen pa la/ yang rigs
456b4(yum): nyid ben pa'i phyir nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbed pa'o// dngas pa med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa dben para'o// ngabag song pa nying me ga
456b5(yum): byi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dngos pa med pa'i ri ba skang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par// dran nye bar gzhag pa
456b6(yum): phyir shes rab kyi rol tu khyen pa dben par// yang dag par snang ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba dben pa'i phyir zhes
456b7(yum): kyi mtshun pa po pag// dbang pang yin pa'i phyir gas rab gyi tsho byed pa be pa'o// skabs ba dang 'phyi rgyas sa na
456b8(yum): byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba
457a1(yum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi phyin pa dben pa'o// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ben par
457a2(yum): tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par/
457a3(yum): rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa dben pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
457a4(yum): pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshad ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mngon par shes pa dben pa
457a5(yum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// gzungs kyi snod dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
457a6(yum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pa rol
457a7(yum): byin pa dben pa// seMs yang dag par rig par zin pa'i phyir shes rab ci pa la phyin pa zin pa'o// sring rje chen po ben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ral phyin
457a8(yum): pa ben pa'o// nasangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres par rnyed pa'i phying nas rab kyi ma tsun pa dben pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bung be pa'i byo
457b1(yum): kyi ma sbyin pa ben par/ ya cag m+b+hi 'dra ba'i 'bras bung ben pa'i ba sa la sa tsun par ben par// byar 'ong ba 'anas grang
457b2(yum): ra kyi par mi rgyun pa dngan par// dam nam pa dang ben pa'i mying shes rab kyi tshun par ben po'o// rangabyung ba byen pa'i phyir shes rabartsi sa na na
457b3(yum): mamo gyirnam pa nga ben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ma tsun pa da pa'o// dpa rnams cadus phyin pa ding dzin pa myi'i gas pa rgyas pa nga pa na
457b4(yum): lha'i brag khyang chubasams dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnam thams ca da ben par bshad pa la sems mi nu ba langs sa sum par ma 'gyur ba/ dong 'ang ma
457b5(yum): 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snang ngong // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces pa/
457b6(yum): stsal to// rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhum par mi 'gyur ba yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos tham
457b7(yum): cad ma mchis pa'i srad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dben pa dang /
457b8(yum): ni bdang / ma skyes pa'i srangang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i srang byang chub sem
458a1(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyuraro// da tsa'i srang du nen/ bcom ldan 'das de de 'di ltar gang num par
458a2(yum): 'gyur ba dang / gang gis num par 'gyur ba dang / gang la rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis paste/ dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gal te/
458a3(yum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de skad du bshad pa la/ mi 'dzum mi 'gong zhing tshi tshang pa dang / sgyid lug par ma'i gyur la mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na/
458a4(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lpags so// de ci'i srang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par mi 'gyur ba'am/ gang gis zhum par mi 'gyur ba'am/ gang la
458a5(yum): zhum par 'gyur ba d+he ga thams cad ni ma mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bang po dang bcas patshangs pa dang bcas/
458a6(yum): ste dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i rnarnams kyis phyag bgyi bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cha
458a7(yum): geng shes rab kyi ral tu phyin pa la stong pa de ni dbang po dang bcasatshangs pa dang bcas/ skyeng bu'i bdag po dang bzlas pa'i lharnams kyis phrag bya bar yang mi zadang/
458a8(yum): 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa'i kha ga dang ldan pa/ dge rgyas dang 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas cang ma'i ris kyis rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi ral tu phyin pa la ma
458b1(yum): snang bya na thasems dpa' mangs da can par la phyug byupa la // rab byar byags pacu' 'jug da kyis sa nags
458b2(yum): ba rtags pa'i sangasargyas blangs med cad meng pag maud cig zugs pa maspang ba dadas byang chub sems dpa' mams dpa' tshan chags kyib ma tshun pam nga
458b3(yum): pa la dbangs pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi rab tu phyin pa la sbyang pa ni sbyin pa'i b.ram tu phyin yongs sa rtogs pazung ngo /
458b4(yum): rnams kyi pha rob tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i rab tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi rol du phyin pa 'angs su ma rdzoms pa
458b5(yum): zung bag// bsam gtad kyi ma tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par/ shes rab kyi rim du phyin pa 'angs su rdugs par byeng // dang spong pa 'ing yos su rdzogs pa
458b6(yum): myong ba sa pa 'angs mardzogs par byung bal/ khyim mang tshang yangs su chags par byed par// gangs su song pas sems pa gyung
458b7(yum): chen pa srang pa cing yangs su rtags par byeng bag/ danangs pa sang pa tsha yangs su rtags par byed pag// 'dus byas snang pacing sangs sa rdzogs par byed pag// 'das
458b8(yum): byas sungapa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa sang pa cing yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// thog ma ngang tha ma med pastong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
459a1(yum): da nga med pa stong pa nyid yangs su ma rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang bzhi nga snang pa tshad yangs su rdzogs par byed bag/ rdzas thams cadas
459a2(yum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang gi mtshan cid snang ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed par// mi dmigs pa srung po cid yangs sartags par byed bag// dam pa
459a3(yum): bstong pa nyid yongs su brdzogs par byed pa'o// ji zan stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dngos po mang pa'i dzi ba ci snang pa cing yongs sa rdzogs par bya
459a4(yum): pa'o// drad pa nye bar gzhag pa pa ni yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// yang dag par spong ba ba ni yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa bani yongs su rdzogs pa
459a5(yum): byed pa'o// dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//
459a6(yum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byeng ba'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bsam gtan pa ni yongs su rdzogs
459a7(yum): par byed pa'o// tshad med pa po na yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa ba ni yongs su rdzogs par byed ba'o// rnam parar pa byud
459a8(yum): yongs su rdzogs su par byed pa'o// mthar gyis gnas snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang /
459b1(yum): sgyu sa/ sa
459b2(yum): shesapa / sa / sa sa
459b3(yum): sa ya dag shi pazhi ma rdugs par byung pa la/ sas rje sa par byed da/
459b4(yum): rnags par byed pal// rdzun zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sangs su rdzogs par byung bar// man cig pa 'ang ba'i 'grus bu po mardzogs pa byung sa
459b5(yum): bdang dus tha mangs sa rdzogs par byed pa'o// dgra ba ma pa nyid yangs sa rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang byang chub sangos sutshugs par byed pa la/
459b6(yum): pad sems dgas par byed pa'o// rnam thams cad ma khyen pa cing 'dim mjugs par byud pal// nas bya ba gis pa ma / rab 'byang chu
459b7(yum): dpa' sems dpa' can pa zhes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa ni gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems par
459b8(yum): chen mdzi ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba zhugs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gang 'ga'i klung gi byem snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can gang ji snyed cig yong ba de gang /
460a1(yum): cang bdud sdig can du 'gyur te/ bdud srog tacan rjes kyang de skyed kyi bdud srog tocan mngon par sgrus kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems
460a2(yum): sems dpa' chen po la bar chad bya bar ma nus so// rab 'byor chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig tonan rnams kyis mthub
460a3(yum): pa yin de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ des chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par bltas pa yin des sems can thams cad kyang yongs su ma bting ba yin te/ rab 'a
460a4(yum): chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sdig tocan rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
460a5(yum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan pa ni bdud sdig can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di skad du smras pa de bzhin du byed pa/
460a6(yum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
460a7(yum): dpa' chos de gnyis dang ldan pa'i ni bdud sdig tocan rnams kyis mithub pa yin no// rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dreng du ni lha'i blarnams ca
460a8(yum): 'a ba sems so// bsnyen pa su byung dang / seM su ba dang / bu ba yang byung bar byung te/ rigs kyi bu gyings sus gyis byang chu ba myur du la bapar ra / san gis kyi/
460b1(yum): kyi 'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyis rnam par sdung pa dang / mtshan ma med pas rnam spyod pa dang / smon pa med pas rnam par srung bdenis rnam par snang bar gyis nig/ de ci'i byor nan/ rigs
460b2(yum): kyi rnam par srung padas rnam par spyod pa dang / sems canamagan med po rnams kyimag du 'gyur// sems sbyabs med pa rnams kyi sbya su nga // sems su se
460b3(yum): kyis brang gnyen du 'gyur ro// sems can gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro// sems canan pa rnams kyin du 'gyur ro// sems can gling med pa rnams kyi sring du 'gyur ro// sems
460b4(yum): rlan par gyur ba rnams kyi snang bar 'gyur ro// nas des snga bskyed par gyur ro// de ci'i phyir nyen/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi thams cad pang blangs med pa dganas sanas bcing ldan sa kyim
460b5(yum): ngan srong ga dag bdun gyis yongs su bskur tathugs ma sa ma snang ba dang / chas ston pa dag kyang byang drub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa gang shes rabagyi pa la du bying pas sbyang /
460b6(yum): 'dzig pa/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i yan tan de dag dang ldan po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pada'i ming dang rigs langs su brjod pa'i rdul gyis chos san ci cang da nga pa lam
460b7(yum): du ru ba yang / rang 'gyur mis se pa na nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa na can dpal gyim mang sangs su brdung pa'i dus gyis tham sa ci dras phre bas
460b8(yum): nga byang ru sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa gtsug phrad kyi ming longs su bang pa'i tshul gyis chas sun cing cang dra brjod pa ched du da pa dang / de bzhi ni gshegs pa tha bcom pa yangs/
461a1(yum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrug pa'i na 'bring na/ tshangs pa'i spyang pa spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi brel ba de dag gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis sto/
461a2(yum): cing ched du brjod cheng du brjod par mdzad pa bzhin no// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji srid cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang der byang chub sems dpa'
461a3(yum): sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i snang bsrung cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral de dag sngo bar mdzad pa'i rdul gyis chos su dang // rjeng du brjod pa yang ched du brjod mdzad /
461a4(yum): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa
461a5(yum): spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de lta spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
461a6(yum): gang nga gi bcugs nga snang dang / ma srid pa gathang da/ byang chub sengs dpa' sems dpa' chen pagapa sring kyi// mangs pa'i sring bsrung kyi nas kyi
461a7(yum): byi pa dang mthal ba de dag la sa pa ma da pa'i rdul gyim nas spyod / nga du sa dab yang cad du mdzas// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan das gang sang rtsig bzugs pa byung bdang /
461a8(yum): chos ston pa de dag kyang der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji srid cig tshangs pa'i srung bsrung cing shes rab ci rol tu phyid pa dang mabral ba de dag la slob mdzang pa'i tshul gyim chem san ta/
461b1(yum): tshang ba jas yang du brjod pa mang dang / byang ba byugs marnams kyi sangs rgyas bcam ldan 'das gang jin cig brlags ning ltung ba dang / nas gan pa ngag kyang zu mas
461b2(yum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pa gang jisang cig tshangs pa'i spad pa spyad cing / shes rab kyi ram tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag snga par mdzang pa'i tshul gyise chos sa te/ ched du brjong ba yang nga brjo
461b3(yum): pa mang dang / shar kya 'byigs marnams kyisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gapang mad byig bcus zhing 'am srung ba dang / rnamanan pa de dag kyang des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' ba
461b4(yum): srang cig changs pa'i spyad pa spang cing shes rab kyi rol tu phyir pa dang ma thal bar de dag la sngo bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chas snyan te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad // lho nub kyi phyogs mtsham
461b5(yum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho stong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji skad cig tshangs pa'i spang ba spong
461b6(yum): cing shes rab kyi ris tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spo bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos snyan te/ che dadu brjod pa yang ched du brjod par mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangasadus
461b7(yum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho byu dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang den/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyang ba spyod cing shes rab kyi
461b8(yum): rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spo bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos bston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod par mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang cisring kyi
462a1(yum): bzugs shing 'am sbyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang ded/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang jis cig chas pa'i srung bsrung ci shes rab kyi ram tu phyin par
462a2(yum): ma 'bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos stan te/ che dang brjod pa yang cing dradu brjod pa mdzad// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji srid cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
462a3(yum): chos ston pa de dag kyang de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji srid cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa cing shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag la spo bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos sun
462a4(yum): ched du brjod pa yang che du brjod pa mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du byang chub kyi
462a5(yum): lam yongs su spyod pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag slongab mdzangad pa'i rdul gyis chos stan/ ched du 'arjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzadza/
462a6(yum): phyir chen/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa gang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyu bached pa'i don du bcugs pa de dag ni dka' babyed pa'o// gsal ba bcom ldan 'dams su
462a7(yum): bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po slar mug pa'am/ slar mi ldog pa'am/ gang gi mang yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis snyan pa mdzad do// bcom ldan sa kyi
462a8(yum): bka'astsal pa/ rab 'bying byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa phyir mi ldog pa las shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la srung ba yang yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos su
462b1(yum): ma sags kyi la tshu pas sung pa yang ma dag las sa rgyas bcom ldan las ngag napa mang rgya larna pa ma @
462b2(yum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po gang byang chub sems dpa'i sa
462b3(yum): dab ni ni gnags pa'i dge btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i mangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i dris sus pa pa'i tshul gyis rnam par srung ba de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de sa sreb
462b4(yum): mang pa'i tshul gyis chos sun cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod par mdzad do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ni chen dpal gyidris su slob pa'i rdul gyis
462b5(yum): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos san cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do//
462b6(yum): rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad skye ba med par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
462b7(yum): thob pa/ chos thams cad song pa'o zhes bya ba dang chos thams cad ni ba'i zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad gsogs papas/ rig lus sa zhes bya ba dang / snying ba mang pan
462b8(yum): zhes bya bar mos kyang mi skyes pa'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ste/ de dag la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de sngo bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du
463a1(yum): brjod pa mdzad do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongs su bsdu
463a2(yum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis
463a3(yum): spangs pa yin te/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang lung ma bstan pa yi ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
463a4(yum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong pa gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos son cing / che dadu ba
463a5(yum): pa yang tshang du brjod par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// de la gnas pa'i rnam pa
463a6(yum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang ma
463a7(yum): gad pa thags/ de ni bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa ci ltar bshad pade ban no zhes rim dur med kyi kyi tsam mchil
463a8(yum): rmongs par mi gyur na/ des ni phyis kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi'i khrug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' theg pa
463b1(yum): sa ng+ya ga lam thus par 'gyur pa/ byung chugasems dpa'ajam pa pa shes pa kyang rdzus ma ya gyu pa 'damams / sa rgyu /

463b3(yum): byid marjes pa ni ngan myang por 'gyur ba yin te/ gang gis ma ma mams nas debu ni ra ming du gnas pa dang / de bzhin mong nga na da byed pa de dag smos cang smos te das

463b7(yum): 'chang rgyu bar 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chas ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid kyang ngamigs sum mchis na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid ma
463b8(yum): gnas te/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyab dang / de bzhin nyid la/ gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba la tsasas te/
464a1(yum): gnas mamachisas/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'byong ga khyod kyis ris dadu gad+hA ba ni ming pal gnas padang

464a4(yum): par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos snga/
464a5(yum): par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ci skad du sbas pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor gang de bzhin nyid la gnas

464b1(yum): lus/ da ma dang/ smra rkyer na/ rang 'byung ba gnags mas gyu / sa

465a5(yum): chol yang chags pa med do// 'dis ste dper na/ bar snang la 'phangs pa'i mda' ni yang 'chags pa zad do// de bzhin du gnas pacan rab 'byar gyis rnas

465a7(yum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bdag gis de skad dregasas te/ de skad du brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsu

465b1(yum): stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka gang khyad kyis de skad du smras te/ de skang du brjod pas/ de bzhir gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / chos su brjod

466b6(yum): btu rab 'byor stong pa nyidas rnam par spyad pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rab tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs ma/ gang sbyir ba'i pha rol tu byin bu la spyong pa la ni sa/
466b7(yum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gong tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa lnga smras/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmi pa
466b8(yum): gang bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci sras/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byu
467a1(yum): pa lA tsi sras/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ci sas/ shes
467a2(yum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pal ni smras/ rang snang ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang nang stong pa nyid
467a3(yum): snyam pa lta ci smos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyi stong pa nyid la bsgob pa lta ci smos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyi nang
467a4(yum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa lta ci smras/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi
467a5(yum): dmigs na/ gang chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa lnga ci smras/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ dor dam pa stong pa nyid bsnam pa lnga ci smos/ 'dus
467a6(yum): byas spong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang 'das byas stong pa nyid bsgob pa lta ci smos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang 'das ma
467a7(yum): stong pa nyid bskor ba lta ci smras/ mtha' las 'angs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs ra/ gang mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid bsgom pa lnga ci smras/ thog ma dang/
467a8(yum): tha ma med pa spang ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa lta ci smos/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/
467b1(yum): sa ma / nga ma smra
467b2(yum): nga ba snyi ba ma she nam thamamaca nga da parnam pa rnasasapa/ ma sa
467b3(yum): gi mtshan gi snang bzhid bskam pa lnga sa pa/ mi dmigs pa spang ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bas pa sa mas/
467b4(yum): med pa stong ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dngos pa med pa spang ba nyid busam pa lnga ci sbas/ ngo bo nyid sang pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang zab nyid da
467b5(yum): banyid bskam pa la ci snyam/ dang ma po meng pa'i nga za nyid spang pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dngas pa med pa ngo bo nyid bang shing bskam pas kyi
467b6(yum): dra paka bar gnag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smras/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang mi dmigs/
467b7(yum): ni/ gang yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsgom pa lnga ci smras/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la ba
467b8(yum): bal ci smras/ dbang po rnams kyang mi dmigs ra/ ga~Mng dbang po rnams la bskam pa la ci spos/ sabs rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang zung
468a1(yum): rnams la bsgom pa lda ci snyam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bskam
468a2(yum): palta ci smos/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang po dmigs na/ gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa lnga ci smos/ 'ja
468a3(yum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang 'phags pa'i bden pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ bsam gtan rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang bsam
468a4(yum): gtan rnams la bsgom pa ci smos/ tshad med pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang tshad med pa rnams la bsgom pa lnga ci smos/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa
468a5(yum): 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang mi dmigs
468a6(yum): mgang rnam par thar ba rnams la bskam pa la skam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i skams par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs ma/ gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnams
468a7(yum): par 'jug pa rnams la bsgom pa la ci snyam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshar pa med pa dang thar pa med pa yang mi dmigs na/ gang rnam par mthar pa'i
468a8(yum): glang ba de dang mtshan ma med pa dang slar pasra bsam pa lnga na ma/ mang par shes pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mngon par shes pa rnams la bskam
468b1(yum): ya nga ba dmags ma gang nal rnams sa 'amam pa la chas/ mas tsas mas ma
468b2(yum): kyi sku rnams la bsgom pa la ci gas/ de 'dir gshegs pa'i skabs rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang de ba nir gshegs pa'i skabs rnams la bsam
468b3(yum): sas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mi 'jigs pa rnams la bsgrub pa lnga ci smras/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang mi dmig
468b4(yum): ma gangs pa yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsnam pa la ci smras/ snying rje chen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang snying rje chen po la rnam par spyod pas cesas/
468b5(yum): sangs rnas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par sgrub pas cims/ rgyur du zhugs
468b6(yum): 'bras bug kyang mi dmigs ma/ gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thab pa la ci mas/ lan cig phyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sa
468b7(yum): phyir 'ang ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa sa ci sras/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thab pal ci smras/ dgra
468b8(yum): po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dgra bcor pa'i 'bras bu rjes su 'dzub pa la ci sas/ rang byang chub zhid kyang mi dmigs na/ yang byang chub kyi 'bras bu
469a1(yum): su 'thob pas sas/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid rjems 'thab pas
469a2(yum): sngas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs ma gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob pas ci thAs/ de bzhin nyid kyang mi
469a3(yum): dmigs na/ gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lnga ci sbas/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang ma skyes pa mngon tu byed ba lta ci smras/ mtshan
469a4(yum): rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gi lus la mtshan yod par 'gyur ba ldan sras/ dpe byad rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gi lus la dpe byad yang
469a5(yum): par 'gyur ba lta ci smras/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor ni thams cad dben pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ dmigs su med pa la spyad
469a6(yum): pa/ snang ba nyid la rnam par srung po/ mtshan ma me dpal rnam par srung ba/ sdod pa med pa la rnam par spyad pa ste/ rbo ka gnas brtan raba'i byar gyi rnam
469a7(yum): par srung pa gang yin pa des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa la rnam par snang ba dang / shes rab kyi par
469a8(yum): phyi ba~M la srung pa'i rnam par srung pal bcu'i cha ge bar mi 'gram// srang gi char yang ge bar mi 'gron// brgya phra srang gi char yang nye bar me ma
469a9(yum): yang nye bar mi 'gyun// bye ba khrag khrig brgya sang gi char yang kye'ang mi 'gror// grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / d+hA ya
469a10(yum): bzadang // daci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs padi rnam par spyad par ma gtags par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che shes rab
469a11(yum): byed pas srung pa gang yid pa dang / nyan thas rnams kyi rnam par skyed pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par snang ba gang yad ba'i rnam
469a12(yum): spyod pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid ni mchog ces bya'o//
469a13(yum): rab ces bya'o// rul zhes bya'o// dam pa sa bya'o// gya rlom pa zhes bya'o// blan mod pa gong na med pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mor nyam
469a14(yum): dang mnyam pa'o// ko'u shi ka de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas
469a15(yum): 'dim pa/ shes rab kyi pa rab tu phyin pa'i rnam par srung ba 'di nyid kyis rnam par srung bar bya'o// kyi phyi nin/ tshugs shes rab kyi par
470a1(yum): / tu phyir pa lnga rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ninya/ na thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las
470a2(yum): 'da' ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
470a3(yum): chos rnams yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad
470a4(yum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ye shes rjes su thob nas/ bag chags kyi
470a5(yum): 'tshams sbar ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i ngo bo zhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//
470a6(yum): gcig zhes
